loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica is a 33-year-old, hardworking lady. She is married with two children both of whom are in school. Veronica lives in Kisauni, in her own house with clean tap water. Her major monthly expenditure is the payment of school fees.
She runs a water selling business and has been running it for two years now. She has requested a loan of KES 15,000 to buy a water tank. This will enable her to satisfy her customer’s needs. She is grateful for the opportunity.

loans.use: to buy a water tank.

loans.name: Flavia

texts.en:
Flavia is 34 years old and lives in Koboko, Uganda. She is married and has 2 children who are all currently in school. For the past 13 years, Flavia has been working hard to manage her décor business, which rents party decorations and flowers.

To help expand her business, Flavia has requested a loan of 3,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to add capital and buy more decoration items for parties. This will help Flavia to generate greater profits and meet customer needs. Flavia hopes that in the future she will be able to look after her children.

Flavia is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP). The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Flavia who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to add capital and buy more decoration items for parties.

loans.name: Tatu

texts.en: Tatu is grateful for her previous loan which enabled her business to grow tremendously. She is requesting a new loan of ksh.30000 to restock her retail shop and buy sacks of sugar, packs of tea leaves and detergents.

loans.use: to restock her retail shop and buy sacks of sugar, packs of tea leaves, and detergents.

loans.name: Immaculate

texts.en: Immaculate is a 40-year-old hardworking woman with 3 children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She sells clothes and also has rental houses where she earns extra income. The ever changing customer preferences and price fluctuation affect her business growth while her desire is to own a modern boutique. She is a good mother and desires to educate all her children up to the University level; one of them is already there. Immaculate intends to use the loan to buy clothes and pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy clothes and pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Odette

texts.en: Odette is 27 years old. She is married to a businessman and they have two children who are 1 and 3 years old. With the loan, she wants to buy more goats and cows to sell. The profits from the business will be used to provide food for the family.

loans.use: to buy more cows and goats to sell.

loans.name: Jean Pierre

texts.en: Jean Pierre is 32 years old. He sells different beers in his bar. With the loan, he wants to add more beers for sale. The profits from the business will be used to make savings.

loans.use: to buy more beers for sale.

loans.name: Andranik

texts.en:
Andranik, a 33-year-old farmer from Margahovit village in Lori region, lives with his parents, wife and two sons. Andranik runs a farm which currently includes 6 cows, 10 chickens and 10 colonies of bees. As the only breadwinner of the family, he works hard to sustain his big family.

Because it is very difficult for Andranik to save money and expand his livestock, he is requesting this loan to purchase a cow and five pigs. This will lead to a higher income which will improve his family's living conditions. Andranik dreams of having a big farm, and this loan is one more step on the road to achieving that dream.

loans.use: to pay for a cow and five pigs.

loans.name: Marcos Antonio

texts.es: Marcos de 59 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa e hijo. Él se dedica  a la agricultura de los principales granos básicos como son: maíz y frijol. Después de sacar la cosecha  comercializa una parte de su cultivo para poder suplir las necesidades de su hogar que cada día son mayores. Él es muy  trabajador, emprendedor cuya principal motivación es darle el sustento y una buena calidad de vida a su familia con el fruto de su trabajo. Ha trabajado toda su vida en la agricultura y es así como ha logrado formar su hogar, ya que esta es su principal fuente de ingresos tomo la decisión de acercarse a una agencia de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito ya que la fecha para empezar las siembras se aproximan y quiere asegurar el terreno para su próxima siembra. Este préstamo le servirá  para invertir en la comprar de los insumos agrícolas como: semillas, insecticidas, abonos, etc.  Para comenzar la siembra lo más antes posible y poder cosechar los frutos de su esfuerzo. Confía plenamente que obtendrá una cosecha abundante la cual la cual le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Marcos is 59 years old. He lives in a house on his property with his wife and child. He makes a living through the agriculture of the main staple grains, corn and beans. After the harvest, he sells a part of his crops to be able to supply the necessities of his home that each day are becoming greater. 

He is very hard-working and enterprising, and his primary motivation is to provide sustenance and a good quality of life to his family with the fruit of his labors. He has worked all of his life in agriculture, which is how he has succeeded in forming his home since this is his main source of income. 

He made the decision to approach an agency of INTEGRAL to request a loan since the date to begin the sowing is approaching and he wants to secure the land for his next sowing. This loan will be used to invest in the purchase of agricultural supplies such as seeds, insecticides, fertilizers, etc. to begin the sowing as early as possible and to be able to harvest the fruits of his labor.

 He fully believes that he will obtain an abundant harvest which will permit him to improve his and his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of agricultural supplies such as: seeds, insecticides, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Ameeda

texts.en:
Ameeda sells ice cream and cold, pure water in Ayensudu, near Elmina. Ameeda has received no formal education. She is married and has five children. Her husband is a blacksmith in their community. 

Ameeda has been selling ice cream and water for some time now. She is responsible for supporting her husband with their family's general living expenses. 

Her loan will be used to buy an increased quantity of local ice cream and pure water to sell in the market. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to grow her ice cream and water-selling trade and save for the future.

loans.use: to buy an increased quantity of local ice cream and pure water to sell in the market.

loans.name: Cristino

texts.es:
El señor Cristino tiene 68 años, es casado, vive con su esposa en la compañía Caballero Punta de Ybycuí, tiene   4 hijos todos mayores de edad y casados, que ya son independientes.
Cristino cuenta que hace aproximadamente 40 años se dedica a la actividad de las ventas, ya que tiene una despensa y también vende leche, para comenzar con su negocio nos cuenta que recibió ayuda de su papá quien le regaló el terreno donde construyó su casa, además de que le dio vacas lecheras para poder sustentarse, y gracias al esfuerzo y el trabajo arduo pudo ahorrar y montar su despensa junto con su esposa. Día a día fue surtiendo su negocio y gracias a la buena atención  pudo formar su clientela. El es una persona muy trabajadora y resultado de eso es que sus hijos son personas de bien.
El préstamo solicitado será destinado para la compra de productos varios para surtir mejor su despensa, como ser verduras, carnes, panificados, frutas, fideos, y demás. Agradece a la Fundación Paraguaya y kiva por la oportunidad que recibe, espera poder satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes ofreciéndoles mayor variedad de productos.
texts.en:
Sr. Cristino is 68 years old and married. He lives with his wife in Caballero Punta de Ybycuí. They have four grown children who are married and independent.

Cristino has been in the retail business for approximately 40 years. He manages a food pantry, but he also sells milk. When he started his business, Cristino says that he received help from his father who gave him land on which to build his house as well as two dairy cows by which he could support himself. Thanks to his effort and hard work, Cristino was able to save some money and open a food pantry with his wife. Each day he keeps his business stocked and thanks to his good service, he was able to establish a customer base. Cristino is a hardworking person, and as a result, his children have turned out to become good people.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy various products to restock his food pantry such as vegetables, meat, baked goods, fruits, noodles, and other items. He is grateful to Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva for the opportunity he has received. Cristino hopes to satisfy the needs of his customers by offering them a wider variety of products.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat, baked goods, fruits, noodles, and other products.

loans.name: Evaste

texts.en: Evaste is 43 years old. She is married with two children. She sells cows and goats. With the loan, she wants to buy more cows and goats to sell. She is planning to build a house with the profits.

loans.use: to buy more cows and goats to raise and sell.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is single and has 4 children. She has received no formal education. Mary owns and operates a bakery in Ayensudu, which she has done for some time now. Mary uses her income to support herself and her children and save for their future. Mary will use the loan to purchase an increased quantity of ingredients and supplies necessary to operate her bakery and meet her customer’s demands. With the new profits from her expanded business, Mary plans to develop her bakery shop further and save for the future.

loans.use: to purchase an increased quantity of ingredients and supplies necessary to operate her bakery.

loans.name: Constantine

texts.en: Constantine is 29 years old. She has sold sugar and rice for the past four years. With the loan, she wants to buy more sugar and rice to sell. The profits from the business will be saved.

loans.use: to buy more sugar and rice to sell.

loans.name: Asibe

texts.en:
Asibe is single and has four children. She has received schooling through middle school level. 

Asibe sells cooked rice in Ayensudu, near Elmina. She has been selling her cooked rice recipe for some time now. Asibe uses her income to support herself and her children and to save for their future. 

Asibe will use the loan to purchase an increased quantity of rice and other ingredients necessary to prepare her rice for sale in the market. With the new profits from her expanded business, Asibe plans to increase her capital base and secure her business, now and in the future.

loans.use: to purchase an increased quantity of rice and other ingredients necessary to prepare her rice for sale in the market.

loans.name: Katsaka

texts.en: Katsaka is grateful for her previous loan. It helped her improve her business. She has now requested a loan of KES 50,000 to buy sacks of charcoal.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Hector Alfonso

texts.es: Hector de 38 años de edad vive con su esposa de 22 años de edad y su pequeño. Es un hombre muy trabajador ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por dar y brindar lo mejor para su familia, es honesto, sincero que su mayor sueño y anhelo es que sus hijos siempre viva en condiciones dignas y que en su hogar nunca haga falta el pan de cada día. Actualmente se dedica a la labor de ser jornalero es decir tiene una pequeña cosecha, siembra los principales granos básicos como frijol  y maíz vende cierta parte y lo otro lo deja para su familia, es así como Hector se gana la vida honradamente. El siente la necesidad de mejorar un poco sus cosechas es por esa razón que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para poder así comprar insumos básicos como: Fertilizantes, Pesticidas, Insecticidas, semillas, Abonos entre otros. Él sabe que con eso mejoraran sus ventas y podrá seguirle brindando un buen bienestar a su familia como lo ha hecho hasta el día de hoy
texts.en:
Hector, 38 years old, lives with his 22-year-old wife and his small child. He is a very hard-working man since he has always been known for giving and providing the best to his family. He is honest and sincere. His greatest dream and desire is that his children always live in dignified conditions, and that in his home there is never an absence of daily bread.

Currently, he works as a day laborer, that is he has a small harvest. He sows the main staple grains like beans and corn and sells one part, leaving the other for his family. This is how Hector makes a living honorably.

He feels the necessity of improving his harvests a little, and for this reason he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to be able to buy basic supplies like fertilizers, pesticides, insecticides, seeds, and compost, among others. He knows that with this his sales will improve and he will be able to continue providing comfort and well-being to his family as he has so far.

loans.use: to buy basic supplies like fertilizers, pesticides, insecticides, seeds, and compost, among others.

loans.name: Nahum Misraim

texts.es: Nahum de 51 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa e hijos. Él se dedica al cultivo de los principales granos básicos desde hace muchos años,  la cual realiza año con año para llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Esta actividad son las que le permiten  cubrir las necesidades básicas de su hogar y Nahum las realiza con gran empeño y dedicación. Él es un hombre trabajador,  honrado y responsable vive en condiciones muy humildes junto a su familia y esta es la razón que le motiva a trabajar duramente para dar lo mejor a su familia ya que es la única forma  de poder cambiar la realidad en la que se encuentran. Nahum sabe que con un poco de ayuda para invertir en sus cultivos, podrá generar más ingresos los cuales le ayudaran a cambiar el futuro de su familia, es por estas razones que se acercó a INTEGRAL, para solicitar un crédito el cual solicita para invertir en la compra de insumos para sus cosechas como pesticidas, abono, semillas, etc. ya que es su  única fuente de ingresos y espera que estas cosechas sean mejores que los años anteriores para tener buenos ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Nahum is 51 years old and lives with his wife and children in a house he owns. He has farmed for many years, cultivating basic grains year after year in order to put bread on the table. His work as a farmer, which he performs with great dedication and resolve, has enabled him to cover the basic necessities of his household. He is a hardworking, honest and responsible man, who lives modestly with his family. The reason he works so hard is to provide the best for his family because this is the only way to change the realities they face.

Nahun knows that with a little help he will be able to invest in his crops and generate more income, which will help him change his family’s future. Consequently he approached Integral to request a loan so that he can purchase supplies for his crops, such as pesticides, compost, seeds, etc. Farming is his only source of income and he hopes that the coming harvest will be better than in previous years so that he can earn a good living for his family

loans.use: to purchase supplies for his crops, such as pesticides, compost, seeds, etc.

loans.name: David Antonio

texts.es: David de 30 años de edad reside junto a su esposa y sus hijos. Es un hombre visionario que lo que a él más le ha importado en la vida es dar lo mejor para sus hijos y que estos se lo agradezcan el día de mañana. Es muy trabajador se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador, ya que en la vida lo que mas desea en que sus hijos vean el esfuerzo que su padre hace dia a dia. Actualmente posee una pequeña cosecha donde cultiva:  maíz, maicillo, lororco. Buscando el bienestar de sus hijos David desea ampliar más su cosechas, mejorarlas y que siempre sean las preferidas por los clientes  es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL  para solicitar un crédito para la compra de insumos básicos como: fertilizantes, pesticidas, semillas, abonos u otros siempre buscando lo mejor para su familia espera contar con la ayuda necesaria y así seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar
texts.en:
David is 30 years old and lives with his wife and children. David is always thinking about and planning for the future, because the most important thing in life for him is giving the best to his children and that his children be grateful for tomorrow. David is known for being hardworking, and what he wants most in life is for his children to see the effort and hard work their father puts in to each day.

David has a small field where he grows corn, sorghum and loroco [a vine with edible buds and flowers used for cooking]. Thinking of his children’s welfare, David wants to increase and improve his harvest so that customers always prefer his products to others. For this reason he approached INTEGRAL to request this loan to buy basic agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, pesticides, seeds, manure and others. David says that he is always looking for the best for his family and he hopes to receive the help necessary to continue bringing home bread to his family each day.

loans.use: to buy basic agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, pesticides, seeds, manure and others.

loans.name: Felix Antonio

texts.es: Felix de 52 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su compañera de vida y sus hijos. Él se dedica a la agricultura desde hace muchos años.Felix cultiva los principales granos básicos como: Maicillo  y maíz. Cada año repite esta actividad ya que es la única forma que conoce para ganarse la vida. Es una persona muy trabajadora, responsable y emprendedora. Vale la pena mencionar que vive en condiciones muy humildes junto con su familia, pero esta situación no lo desanima si no que le da fuerzas para continuar luchando por una calidad de vida diferente. Trabaja muy duro para llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos  diferente a la agricultura. Es por esta razón que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar es préstamo a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra del abono, fertilizantes, pesticidas y semillas. Con mucha confianza en Dios y en su trabajo espera tener una cosecha abundante de la cual pueda vender una parte y dejar otra parte para el consumo. Espera cumplir su sueño de dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en: Félix, 52, lives in the house he owns with his life companion and their children.  He’s worked in agriculture for many years growing main grains like sorghum and corn.  He repeats this activity every year since it’s the only way he knows to earn a living.  He’s a very hardworking, responsible and enterprising man.  It’s worth mentioning that he lives under very humble conditions with his family but this situation does not discourage him but rather gives him the strength to continue striving toward a different quality of life.  He works very hard to earn his home’s daily bread since he has no other source of income besides agriculture.  Because of this, he’s decided to request an INTEGRAL loan to buy manure, fertilizer, pesticide and seeds.  With much trust in God and in his work, he hopes to obtain an abundant harvest to sell part of and to consume the other.  He hopes to reach his dream of providing better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer, pesticide and seeds.

loans.name: Blanca Delmy

texts.es: Blanca 39 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposo y sus hijos. Ella se dedica  a la agricultura de los principales granos básicos como son: maíz y frijol. Después de sacar la cosecha  comercializa una parte de su cultivo para poder suplir las necesidades de su hogar que cada día son mayores. Ella es una mujer muy emprendedora y admirable lo más importante en la vida es ganarse el pan de cada día dignamente con el trabajo de sus manos .Ha trabajado toda su vida en la agricultura y es así como ha logrado sobrevivir, puesto que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos diferente a la agricultura. Como toda mujer emprendedora y visionaria ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a esta institución ya que la fecha para empezar las siembras se aproximan y quiere estar preparada.  Es por esta razón que solicita este préstamo a INTEGRAL para invertir en la comprar de los insumos agrícolas como: semillas, insecticidas, abonos u  otros. Para comenzar la siembra lo más antes posible y poder cosechar los frutos de su esfuerzo. Confía plenamente que obtendrá una cosecha abundante la cual la cual le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Blanca is 39 years old and lives with her husband and children in a house they own. She is a farmer who cultivates basic grains, such as corn and beans. After the harvest, she sells some of her crops in order to meet the increasing needs of her household. She is a very enterprising and admirable woman. It is most important to her to earn her daily bread in life by working decently with her own two hands.  

Blanca has worked all her life as a farmer and that is how she has survived since she can rely on no other source of income than agriculture. Like all visionary and enterprising women, she has decided to approach Integral because the date to begin sowing is approaching and she wants to be prepared. Thus she has requested this loan in order to purchase agricultural supplies, such as seeds, insecticides, fertilizer and other items. She wants to begin planting as soon as possible so that she can reap the fruit of her labor. She is confident that she will have an abundant harvest, which will enable her to improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, insecticides, fertilizer and other items.

loans.name: Mauricia Del Socorro

texts.es: Mauricia del Socorro es una mujer de sesenta y cinco años de edad, soltera, madre de seis hijos de 31, 32, 36, 37, 38, y 40 años de edad, todos independientes,. Es una mujer, trabajadora responsable, con ganas de superación personal, el cual desde muy joven ha tenido que trabajar para ganase el sustento de cada día. Ella es originaria del departamento de Chinandega el cual está ubicado en la zona de occidente del país, desde hace seis años se dedica a atender una pulpería, de la cual es propietaria, el  negocio primeramente lo inició como una tienda de ropa posteriormente fue incluyendo productos de consumos básico para el hogar, en el cual ofrece, granos básicos, productos de limpieza como jabones y detergentes, alimentos empacados, entre otros productos. Actualmente también cuenta con el apoyo económico de sus hijos. Mauricia solicita el crédito para fortalecer su capital de trabajo. Su meta es en un futuro poder terminar de construir su casa.
texts.en: Mauricia del Socorro is a sixty-five year old woman.  She is the mother of six children who are 31, 32, 36, 37, 38, and 40 years old.  They all live independently from her.  Mauricia is a hard-working, responsible woman who wants to improve her situation.  She has worked since she was very young to earn her daily bread.  She is a native of Chinandega Department, which is located in the west of the country.  For the last six years, Mauricia has made her living running a small grocery store, of which she is also the owner.  The business started out as a clothing store and later she started including basic household products like basic grains, cleaning products like soaps and detergents, packaged foods and other products.  She currently has the financial support of her children.  Mauricia is requesting the loan to strengthen her working capital.  Her goal is to, in the future, finish construction on her house.

loans.use: with the purchase of food products like rice, sugar, beans, cooking oil, soap, detergents, oatmeal, matches, dairy products and other items.

loans.name: Dúo Bendicion De San Miguel Group

texts.es:
Dúo bendición de san Miguel
Este dúo está conformado por doña Cindy Johanna, ella tiene 26 años de edad, y tiene una hija de 6 año, doña Cindy se dedica al cultivo de arveja China  en sus terrenos propios que su papa le heredo, el anhelo de ella es tener un tanque de agua para regar su cultivo que en temporada de verano no le favorece bastante la tierra, por lo que su deseo  es ya no estar llevando agua para regar, y lo que ella desea es entregar su producción cada vez mejor eso lo ha logrado gracias a la capacitación que recibe en la cooperativa que esta situada en magdalena milpas altas, porque es socia de la cooperativa ya que lo que cultiva lo vende en la cooperativa y cada vez le exigen de mejor calidad,la actividad que realiza le ayuda para darle lo mejor a sus hija su anhelo es ver crecer y darle lo mejor que ella pueda,esta solicitando este credito para la compra de semillas y abono para su cultivo y tambien para la compra de material para la construccion de un tanque de agua.
texts.en:
St. Michael’s Blessing Duo

Cindy Johanna, 26, is a member of this duo.  She has a six-year-old daughter and she works growing Chinese peas on her own and she inherited from her father.  Her dream is to have a water tank to water her crops during the summer when the land most needs it because she doesn’t want to have to continue lugging water to water the crops and she wants to produce better crops each time; she’s been accomplishing this thanks to training she’s getting from the cooperative located in Magdalena Milpas Altas.  She’s a member of the cooperative because what she grows she sells to it and they insist on better quality every time.  The activity she does helps her provide the best for her daughter.  Her dream is to watch her develop and to give her the very best she possibly can.  She’s asking for this loan to buy seeds and manure for her crops and also to buy the building supplies to build a water tank.

loans.use: to buy seeds and manure and also to buy supplies to build a water tank.

loans.name: Sanobar

texts.ru: Санобару 48 лет. Она является одной из повторных клиентов. Это ее 10 цикл займа. Все предыдущие ее займы имели потребительский характер, и она погасила все свои займы во время. На этот раз она обратилась в ИМОН в целях получения займа для организации собственного бизнеса. Санобар замужем. Ее муж, Бобо занимается услугой мастера по ремонту дома. Она имеет на воспитании 5 детей.  В целях улучшения условия проживания, Санобар хочет организовать свой бизнес, купле продажей индустриальных товаров. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 4000 сомони для покупки товара. Она нуждается и ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Sanobar is 48 years old. She is a repeat borrower, and this will be her 10th loan. Her previous loans were all for personal purposes and she paid them back on time. Now she has approached Imon with the aim of getting a loan to set up her own business. She is married and has 5 children at home. Her husband Bobo works in the field of home repair. In order to improve the family's standard of living, Sanobar wants to start her own business selling household goods. She is seeking a loan of 4,000 Somoni to buy inventory. She needs, and is waiting for, your kindness.

loans.use: To buy household goods to establish a new business

loans.name: Braikasu

texts.en:
Braikasu is married and has three children.  She sells the traditional rice dish, wakye, in Ayensudu near Elmina, which she has been doing for several years. Her husband is a security guard in their community. 

Braikasu is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy increased quantities of rice, beans, and red leaves to prepare her wakye recipe. She hopes to use the profits from her business to expand her wakye selling enterprise. She is responsible for helping to support her husband in paying the family's general expenses.

loans.use: to purchase rice, beans, and red leaves to prepare her wakye recipe.

loans.name: Francine

texts.en: Francine is 23 years old. She sells different items in her boutique. She wants the loan to add more new items, such as rice, sugar, and many more items to sell. She will use the profits to create savings.

loans.use: to buy more rice, sugar, and many more items to sell.

loans.name: Ikrom

texts.ru:
Икром житель Спитаменского района. Ему 43 года. Он женат. Икром живет вместе с женой и родителями. У него трое детей. Его сын работает в частной строительной бригаде. Мать Икрома пенсионерка, а двое других его детей учатся в средней школе. 
Икром работает в ООО Текстайл начальником охраны. Он намерен совмещать работу с бизнесом. Икром намерен открыть магазин стройматериалов. Он взял в аренду помещение, где проводит ремонт. Икром по началу планирует приобрести товары на небольшую сумму. Для того, чтобы начать свою деятельность ему необходима финансовая поддержка. 
Икром берет кредит для приобретения стройматериалов.
texts.en: Ikrom lives in the Spitamen region. He is 43 years old, married, and lives with his wife and parents. He has 3 children. His son works on a private construction crew. Ikrom's mother is retired, and his other two children study in high school. Ikrom works as the chief of security in a company called Textile. He intends to balance this job with his new business. He wants to open a store where he will sell construction materials. He has rented premises that he is fixing up. He plans to start out by spending a modest amount on inventory. In order to start his own business, he needs financial support. Ikrom is seeking a loan to purchase construction materials.

loans.use: to buy construction materials so he can open a store and start his own business

loans.name: Difasi

texts.en:
Difasi is 32 years old and lives in the town of Mbale in Uganda. He is married and has who children who are currently in school. For the past ten years, Difasi has been working hard to manage his retail store which sells sugar, flour, rice and others. 

To help expand his business, Difasi has requested a loan of 3,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to increase his stock and buy sugar and cooking oil for the store. This will help Difasi generate greater profits and boost the business. He hopes that in the future he will be able to be self reliant. 

Difasi is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP). The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like him who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to increase his stock and buy sugar and cooking oil for his store

loans.name: Aba

texts.en: Aba sells bread, the staple product in Ayensudu, near Elmina. Aba has received no formal education.  She is single and has three children. Aba has been selling bread for some time now. She is responsible for supporting herself and her children and saving for their future. Her loan will be used to buy flour, sugar, milk, butter and other necessary ingredients to prepare her breads. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to grow her bread-baking business.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, milk, butter and other necessary ingredients to prepare her breads.

loans.name: Mwanasiti

texts.en:
Mwanasiti is a resident of Likoni, Kenya. She is a businesswoman who runs a retail shop. In this shop, she sells clothes and coconuts. At times, she also sells from door to door. Mwanasiti was introduced to Milango by her friends and joined to access credit.

Mwanasiti is applying for a loan of 64,450 KES to buy coconuts and clothes for sale. She looks forward to a fruitful season ahead.

loans.use: To buy coconuts and clothes for sale.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María tiene un Kiosco abierto donde vende dulces y bebidas pero además la ropa de mascota, para los perros, gatos y conejos. Vende vestidos de fiesta, vestidos del verano, chalecos y chamaras para el invierno y muchos mas. Lo que le gusta mas de su negocio es platicar con sus clientes. Hace doce años que tiene el negocio. En el principio solo vendía los comestibles, bebidas y botanas. Con el apoyo de Fondo Esperanza, pudo sacar créditos chiquitos y puso a vender la ropa de mascota, lo cual le permite ganar mejor sueldo y  apoyar a su familia. María es mama soltera con tres hijos mayores, uno que tiene 28 años y tiene discapacidad mental y vive con ella. Tener el negocio de ropa macota le ha ayudad cuidar a su hijo y comprarle sus medicinas.  María ocupara su préstamo para comprar una cortadora para utilizar en el negocio y para pagar una cuota para el auto usado que compro recientemente para transportar a ella y a su hijo discapacidad al trabajo. 
Mas adelante, Marie le gustaría crecer su negocio y vender solo la ropa de mascota para tener un sueldo mas fijo. Lo que mas le agrada de trabajar con Fondo Esperanza es la oportunidad de conocer gente, y aprender como manejar el negocio.
texts.en:
María has an open kiosk where she sells candy and soft-drinks but also pet clothes for cats, dogs and rabbits.  She sells party dresses, summer dresses, vests and winter jackets and much more.  What she likes best about her business is chatting with customers.  She’s had the business for 12 years now.  At first, she only sold foodstuffs, beverages and snacks.  With Fondo Esperanza’s support she was able to take out small loans and start selling pet clothes which has led to her earning higher income and to help her family.

María is a single mother of three adult children.  One of them is 28-years-old with a mental disability and lives with her.  Having her business selling pet clothes has helped her care for her son and to buy him his medicine.  

María will use the loan to buy a cutter she uses in her business and to make a car payment for the used car she bought recently to transport her and her disabled son to work.

Later on, María would like her business to grow in order to just sell pet clothes and earn a higher income.  What she likes best about working with Fondo Esperanza is the opportunity to meet people and learning how to manage her business.

loans.use: to buy a cutter and to make a car payment.

loans.name: Ernestine

texts.en: Ernestine is 30 years old. She is married with two children. She sells shoes and her husband works as a home-builder. She wants the loan to buy more shoes for sale. With the profits she earns from the business, she plans to boost her savings.

loans.use: To buy more shoes for sale.

loans.name: Claudia Del Rosario

texts.es: Claudia del Rosario es una mujer de cuarenta y cuatro años de edad soltera y madre de dos jóvenes de 21 y 23 años de edad, el menor de ellos estudiante de escuela secundaria. Claudia del Rosario es propietaria de un pequeño negocio donde vende refrescos naturales, también vende comidas rápidas como, tacos, enchiladas, entre otros productos. El negocio lo estableció desde hace cuatro años y lo inició en búsqueda de una forma de subsistir ya que no tenía empleo. Anteriormente  vendía solo refrescos, ahora ha incluido otros productos alimenticios. En la actualidad cuenta  también con el apoyo su hijo mayor. Con el crédito obtenido planea fortalecer su capital de trabajo y así ofrecer productos variados a sus clientes. Dentro de sus metas está terminar de construir su casa. Claudia esta sumamente agradecida con los inversionistas kiva por el apoyo que le brindan a la gente de escasos recursos y que tienen deseo de superación.
texts.en:
Claudia del Rosario, 44, is single and the mother of two young adults who are 21 and 23 years of age; the younger of the two attends secondary school.  Claudia del Rosario owns a small business selling natural beverages; she also sells fast-food like tacos and enchiladas, among others.  She started the business four years ago and started it seeking a way of supporting herself since she was unemployed.  She used to just sell beverages but now she’s included other food items.  She now gets support from her oldest son too.  

She plans to use the granted loan to strengthen her working capital thus offering a variety of products to her customers.  Among her goals is finishing building her house.  Claudia is most grateful to Kiva lenders for the support they provide to people of limited resources who want to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy ingredients, plastic bags, straws, etc.

loans.name: Linda

texts.en:
A married mother of two children, Linda sells fruit in Ayensudu, located near Elmina and the community in which her husband is a driver. She has been selling fruit for some time now, as she is responsible for helping her husband pay the family's accommodation bills and their children's school fees.

Linda will use her loan to buy an increased quantity and variety of fruit to sell in the market. She hopes to apply the new profits arising from the loan to develop her enterprise and possibly build a stall in the future.

loans.use: to buy an increased quantity and variety of fruit to sell in the market.

loans.name: Ruzanna

texts.en:
Ruzanna is from the Mrgashat village in the Armavir region. She lives with her husband and two children and is involved in agriculture. She owns agricultural land where she cultivates tomato, eggplant and cucumber.
She works hard to gather a good harvest and together with her husband sells it at the local markets.
As agriculture helps Ruzanna to have a stable income, she would like to expand her farm and start breeding cattle one day. Ruzanna has applied for this loan to purchase 3 pigs and forage for feeding them.
The loan is very important for Ruzanna to gather high income and sustain her family.
Ruzanna plans to expand her farm and she hopes that this loan will help her to accomplish her goals.

loans.use: to pay for 3 pigs and forage for feeding them.

loans.name: Marie Chantal

texts.en: Marie Chantal is 31 years old. She is married with three children. She sells rice and sugar does this to provide food for her family. The requested a loan to buy more rice and sugar to sell. She will save the profits generated from the business.

loans.use: to buy more rice and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en: Richard is a 42-year-old man with five children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He is a farmer and for the period that he has been farming he has been able to pay school fees for his children and extend his farming activities. Price fluctuation and unpredictable weather changes affect the business but his desire is to venture into modern farming methods. Richard intends to use the loan to buy seedlings and manure for the farm.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and manure for the farm.

loans.name: Godeleva

texts.en: Godeleva is married, with three children. She sells bananas and has been in the business for two years. With the loan, she wants to add more bananas to sell. The profits from the business will be used to expand the business.

loans.use: to buy more bananas to sell.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is 27 years old. He is married to Irene who is a housewife and they are blessed with two children who are three and seven years old respectively.

Peter owns a small scale shop in his neighborhood. He has been doing this business for the last three years and makes a monthly income of KES. 90,000. He is applying for his third loan from KADET LTD which he will use to boost stock by purchasing more commodities e.g soft drinks, sugar, cooking fats and cooking oil for sale in his retail shop. He will use the anticipated profit to open another shop location.

His dream is to own a chain of wholesale shops thus being able to provide a secure future for his family.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks, sugar, cooking fats and oils for his retail store.

loans.name: Anda Yolanda

texts.es: Anda Yolanda es una mujer de cincuenta y siete años, soltera de un hijo de treinta y cinco años, independiente, desde hace quien años se dedica a su negocio de pulpería en cual distribuye productos de consumo en el hogar como granos básicos, golosinas, artículos de limpieza, productos congelados, cosméticos, entre otros. El negocio lo estableció en su casa con dinero propio, ayuda de su hijo y mucho esfuerzo de superación, con el objetivo de tener una nueva fuente de ingresos. Actualmente está incluyendo dentro de negocio productos nuevos como ropa  variada. Solicita el financiamiento con el fin de tener mayor capital de trabajo y ofrecer productos mucho más variados a su clientela. Su meta es lograr hacer su negocio estable, para poder brindarles un buen futuro a sus nietos. Anda Yolanda está muy agradecida con los inversionistas que le han brindando apoyo para tener un medio de trabajo digno de ellos.
texts.en:
Anda Yolanda, 57, is single and mother of a 35-year-old son who is independent.  She’s had a grocery store for years where she sells staple items like basic grains, snacks, cleaning supplies, frozen goods, cosmetics, etc.  She set up the business at home using her own money, help from her son and much effort for improvement with the goal of having a new source of income. She’s currently adding such things as assorted clothes to her inventory.

She’s requesting financing in order to have larger working capital to offer a much larger variety of goods to her customers.  Her goal is to have a stable business to be able to offer a better future to her grandchildren.  Anda Yolanda is very grateful to lenders who have offered support so she can have a means of work that’s worthy of them.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Simon Garcia

texts.es: Simon 45 años de edad habita junto  a su familia, su esposa y sus hijos .Por diversos comentarios entre sus vecinos lo caracterizan por ser un hombre muy emprendedor que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser el principal responsable de que en su hogar no falte el pan de cada día. Por sus cualidades sus vecinos lo admiran porque a pesar delas adversidades de la vida siempre se ha trabajado y ha sido responsable con sus hijos y su esposa. Simon se dedica a la labor de ser agricultor cultiva los principales granos básicos de la zona como son maíz y frijol, y así va sufragando las necesidades de su hogar. Simon desea seguir cultivando y vendiendo es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas como: Semillas, Abonos, Fertilizantes, pesticidas etc. Desea contar con la ayuda y de ante mano deja claro que espera saldar la deuda antes de lo previsto
texts.en:
Simon is 45 years old and lives together with his wife and children. He says that he is known among his neighbors for having a strong entrepreneurial spirit and for always being responsible for providing his family with bread each day. Simon says that his neighbors admire him for these qualities.

In spite of life’s challenges, Simon says he has always worked and been responsible for his wife and children. He works in agriculture growing the basic grains of the region, such as corn and beans. He pays for his household expenses from the proceeds of his harvests.

Simon would like to continue growing and selling his crops, and it is for this reason that he approached INTEGRAL to request this loan to buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, manure, fertilizer, and others. He says he hopes to receive this help and also that he expects to pay off the loan early.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, manure, fertilizer, pesticides and others.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is 40 years old and lives in the town of Mbale in the region of Uganda. He is married and has four children, with three of them currently in school. For the past 26 years, Robert has been working hard to manage his sandals business, which sells rubber sandals. 

To help expand his business, Robert has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to add to the business and buy more rubber to make sandals for sale. It will help Robert to generate greater profits and earn money to put his children through school. Robert hopes that in the future, he will be able to employee people to help him run the business. 

Robert is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP). The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Robert who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to add to the business and buy more rubber to make sandals for sale.

loans.name: Michail

texts.ru:
Михаил женат. У него есть приемные дети школьного возраста, а также дочь, которая живет отдельно. Михаил имеет свой бизнес.
Михаил занимается тепличным хозяйством на протяжении 12 лет. Наиболее продаваемые товары: клубника, ранние и поздние огурцы. Михаил ответственный и трудолюбивый. Он является членом поместной церкви.
Михаил просит предоставить ему кредит в сумме 15000 гривен на закупку семян, пленки, дров, шлангов. А также он хочет приобрести трубопровод для отопления. Кредит поможет Михаилу подготовиться к сезону и получить хорошую прибыль.
texts.en: Michail is married, has adopted children who are school-aged, and also a daughter who does not live with him.  He has his own business and has been working with greenhouses for 12 years.  His best selling products are strawberries and early and late cucumbers.  Michail is responsible, hardworking and is a member of a local church.  He is asking for a loan of 15,000 UAH to buy seeds, material, wood and irrigation hosing. He would also like to buy piping for heating.  This loan will help Michail prepare for the season and ensure a good profit.

loans.use: To buy seeds, material, wood, and a hose for irrigation.

loans.name: Sharigul

texts.ru: Шаригуль жительница города Вахдат. Ей 56 лет. Она мать троих детей. У Шаригуль есть знания в области вышивания национальных женских одежд. Сейчас она хотела бы заняться этим делом, так как эта деятельность приносит хорошую прибыль. С этой целью Шаригуль обратилась за кредитом. На полученный кредит она планирует приобрести современную компьютерную швейную машину и начать свою новую деятельность.
texts.en: Sharigul lives in Vahdat. She is 56 years old and is the mother of 3 children. She is skilled at embroidering national dresses for women. Now she would like to have her own business in this field, as it can bring in a good income. For this reason, Sharigul is seeking a loan which she plans to use to purchase a modern computerized sewing machine so she can set up her new business.

loans.use: to purchase a modern computerized sewing machine

loans.name: Adela Maritza

texts.es:
Adela es una mujer de 37 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con su esposo y sus dos hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su esposo dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Adela no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Enfermería, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta distraerse viendo televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina unos riquísimos Tallarines Rojos para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Adela se dedica a la agricultura, ella tiene un pequeño cultivo de tuna, en el cual siembra cochinilla, Adela trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por su experiencia en los trabajos de campo.
Adela se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos de la infestación, riego y compra de herbicidas para su cultivo, de esta manera Adela podrá volver a infestar de cochinilla su cultivo de tuna y podrá venderla a un buen precio, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de brindarles una buena educación y profesión a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Adela is 37 years old and lives in the city of Nazca with her husband and her two children who she loves and are her reason for living. She is very friendly, hard working and enthusiastic and alongside her husband she puts all her energy into giving her family a better life. Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic resources, and out of a need to work, Adela was not able to study for a professional career. She wanted to be a nurse and she very much would have liked to have been one. In her free time, she likes to distract herself by watching television and, on occasion, she cooks a delicious meal called Tallerines Rojos to share with her family. 

On her own initiative, and through hard work and dedication, Adela works in agriculture, and she has a small crop of tuna, or cactus fruit, that she uses to raise cochineal insects. She works every day for around 8 hours and believes that everything has worked out for the best because of her experience in the fields. Adela is very grateful to the lenders of Kiva because it is thanks to the help they have given her that she has been able to cover the costs of infestation, irrigation and herbicides for her crop. And so, she has been able to repopulate the cochineal population on her cactus fruit and is able to sell them for a good price. She will continue to work and strive to do her best in order to achieve her dream of giving her children a good education and a profession.

loans.use: cover the costs of her crop.

loans.name: Jamolidin

texts.ru: Жамолидину 46 лет. Он женат и отец двух детей. Его жена работает поваром в столовой. Сам Жамолидин занимается выращиванием цветов в теплице. Сейчас Жамолидин хотел бы начать новый бизнес. Его интересует животноводстводческая деятельность, так как это прибыльное дело. Он запрашивает кредит для купли и продажи крупно-рогатого скота. Жамолидин планирует покупать, откармиливать и продавать скот, и сделать на этом свой бизнес.
texts.en: Jamolidin is 46 years old, married, and the father of two children.  His wife works as a cook at a cafeteria.  As for him, he cultivates flowers in a greenhouse.  Now, Jamolidin would like to start a new business.  He is interested in livestock since it is a profitable business.  He is asking for a loan to help him start buying, fattening and reselling cattle, making this his new business.

loans.use: To buy and sell cattle.

loans.name: Tutikhon

texts.ru:
Тутихон проживает в районе Шахритус. Она замужем. Ей 40 лет. У нее шестеро детей. Тутихон имеет среднее образование. Двое его сыновей находятся на заработках за рубежом. 
Тутихон домохозяйка. На сегодняшний день она хочет заняться торговлей. Тутихон приобрела помещение, которое отремонтировала под магазин. Тутихон берет кредит для покупки продуктов питания, чтобы открыть продуктовый магазин и начать свой бизнес.
texts.en: Tutikhon lives in the Shahrituz region. She is 40 years old, married, and has 6 children. She has a high school education. Two of her children are migrant workers in a foreign country. She is a housewife, but she now wants to get into food sales. She has got premises that she has renovated to be used as a shop. Tutikhon is seeking a loan to buy food products so she can open a grocery store and go into business for herself.

loans.use: to buy food products with which to open a shop

loans.name: Clementine

texts.en: Clementine is 40 years old and married with six children. Her husband works together with her. With this loan, she wants to add more beers to her inventory. She has been selling beer for 12 years.

loans.use: to buy more beers to sell.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is married and has one child. She has received no formal education. Esther is a petty trader, and she is currently trading pineapples and eggs as displayed in the picture. She sells her food products in Ayensudu near Elmina. 

Esther has been working as a petty trader for some time now and diversifies her inventory based on customers' demand and seasonal production. Her husband is a driver. Esther uses her income to help her husband pay their family's general bills and save for their future. 

Esther will use the loan to purchase an increased variety of products to sell in the market. With the new profits from her expanded business, Esther plans to increase her capital base and secure her business now and in the future.

loans.use: to purchase an increased variety of goods to sell in the market.

loans.name: Rosine

texts.en:
Rosine is 27 years old. She sells foodstuffs and has been doing so for four years. 

With the loan, she wants to add more rice and flour for sale. With the profits, she wants to make more savings.

loans.use: to buy more rice and flour for sale.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.en:
Roberto, 24, has been a cacao farmer his entire adult life. Together with his wife Darlina, he is bringing up two children aged three and four. Darlina has been indispensible to running their 1.5 acre cacao farm, and has been helping with activities like cleaning and harvesting. Besides help with maintaining the farm and taking care of the family, she also does local Maya crafts like woven goods from jippi jappa palm. 

Cacao, the only cash crop in many of the local Mayan communities throughout Belize’s southernmost district of Toledo, is also the sole source of income for the family at the moment. For Roberto, harvesting is his favorite part of cacao farming because it is also the most rewarding, as compensation is immediate. Farmers have the option to either sell their cacao fresh or fermented and dried, providing leeway to develop expertise in processing or to instead focus more on the farming itself. Fresh cacao are the seeds of cacao fruit covered with a sweet pulp that begins fermenting shortly after the fruit is cracked open. The most challenging thing about cacao for this young farmer has been trying to keep the monilia fungal disease from spreading in his farm. 

In the future, Roberto wants to expand the family farm, build a comfortable home and save money to invest in the education of the children. An entrepreneur in spirit, Roberto is looking at business opportunities to create alternative sources of income for the family as well. The couple is requesting this loan to expand their cacao farm by 1,000 new trees, more than doubling the current number. To prepare for the expansion, they will hire five men for seven days to clean the area to be planted, and bag cacao seeds. The first step in planting new cacao is raising a seedling in a bag filled with topsoil to make it ready for transplantation into the ground. Once a seedling has four or more leaves, it is ready for planting, and can be expected to become productive in three to five years after.

loans.use: To expand cacao farm by 1000 trees.

loans.name: Evaristo

texts.en:
Evaristo, 48, and his wife Pantiola live in the village of San Antonio, in Belize’s southernmost district of Toledo. They are raising nine children, aged four to 19, three of whom are currently in school and seven live at home. Pantiola is busy taking care of the large family, but also oversees fermentation and drying of cacao. Fermentation stops cacao beans from further ripening and softens their bitter flavor, and drying makes the beans crunchy and further develops their flavor. 

With the help of his children, Evaristo maintains a large cacao farm with around productive 4,500 trees, planted about nine years ago. He initially started to plant encouraged by the arrival of Hershey’s Chocolate in Belize in the early 90’s, but his farm was damaged in the aftermath of the Hurricane Iris in 2001. Evaristo replanted his trees the next season and reached full production again a few years back. A cacao tree typically takes three to five years from the time it is transplanted in the ground to become productive, and continues bearing fruit for decades thereafter. A tree’s productivity is affected by a myriad of factors including tree maintenance, amount of shade, and soil health. 

Evaristo is happy with the state of his farm, especially because he’s been able to keep diseases like the fungal infection monilia in check and not affecting his cacao production. While he enjoys all aspects of cacao farming, Ewaristo says cleaning is by far the most challenging, because a large farm like his takes approximately 80 days to clean on his own. Cleaning is the process of chopping underbrush to keep the farm tidy, with healthy airflow and access to the trees for pruning and harvesting. Farmers in the lush tropical lowlands of Belize have to repeat cleaning around three times a year. In the future, Evaristo hopes to have a model cacao farm and to start growing other fruit trees and fresh vegetables. 

The family is requesting this loan to hire help to clean around the 4,500 cacao trees, a job that will require five men to work about 25 days on the farm.

loans.use: To clean around 4,500 cacao trees.

loans.name: Pricila Del Carmen

texts.es: Pricila del Carmen es una joven mujer de treinta y cuatro años de edad madre de dos niños de 2 y 14 años de edad, el mayor cursa segundo año de la secundaria. tiene por actividad económica la elaboración de tortillas desde hace 4 anos que se dedica a dicha actividad. El negocio de las tortillas la vende por la mañana en su domicilio, . El negocio surgió por la necesidad de tener una fuente de trabajo para darle el sustento a sus hijos y pode sacarle adelante, este oficio lo aprendió de su madre, quien era la que anteriormente tenía el negocio, hoy en día es Pricila quien está a cargo del taller. En esos cuatro años ella ha logrado mantener a su clientela, Su mayor sueño es poder tener capacidad económica suficiente para realizar mejoras en su vivienda que es a la vez su área de trabajo. EL financiamiento lo necesita para invertir en capital de trabajo y comprar materia prima para la elaboración de las tortillas como maíz, leña, cal, comal, bolsas plásticas. Pricila esta muy agradecida con la ayuda que le brindan los inversionistas kiva a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Pricila del Carmen is 34 years old and a mother of two children ages 14 and 2. Her eldest is studying in his second year of high school. For four years she has been working making tortillas, which she sells from her home in the morning.

Pricila’s mother started the business because she needed to work to provide for her children and to help them get ahead. Pricila learned to make tortillas from her mother. In the four years Pricila has been in charge she has maintained all of their customers. 

Pricila’s greatest dream is to have enough money to improve her home, which is also where she has her business. She is requesting this loan to invest in working capital and to buy corn, firewood, gas, lime, plastic bags and a comal [a ceramic dish or metal hotplate for cooking tortillas].  With the loan, she will be able to move ahead with her work to grow the business.

Pricila is very grateful to Kiva lenders for the help they give people with limited resources in developing countries like Nicaragua so that they can have appropriate work.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood, gas, lime, plastic bags and a comal [a ceramic dish or metal hotplate for cooking tortillas].

loans.name: Domithile

texts.en: Domithile is 35 years old. She is married with four children and they all go to school. She sells different items and has been selling retail goods for three years. With the loan, she wants to buy more retail goods to sell. The profits from the business will be used to make savings.

loans.use: To buy more retail goods such as sugar, soaps, lotions and cooking oil for sale..

loans.name: Zulaykho

texts.ru: Зулайхо 29 лет. Она активная и целеустремленная женщина. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Ее муж трудовой мигрант в Российской Федерации и не отправляет достаточно денег для проживания. Зулайхо очень трудно справляться с семейными расходами. Она решила организовать свой бизнес шитьем женской одежды для благо получения семьи. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. От полученного дохода она планирует обеспечить своих детей с хорошим образованием. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1500 сомони для покупки швейной машинки, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Zulaykho is 29 years old.  She is an active and goal-oriented woman.  She is married and is raising 2 children.  Her husband is a migrant worker in the Russian Federation and does not send enough money to live on.  Zulaykho has a very difficult time managing family expenditures.  She decided to start her own business sewing women's clothing to provide for her family.  With this goal she turned to "Achieve Success" organized by the Women's Business Association and earned a certificate.  Now she is able to start her own business and become successful in this sphere.  She plans to use the income to provide her children with a good education.  She is asking for a loan of 1500 somoni for the purchase of a sewing machine to start her business.  She is waiting for your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine to start a new business

loans.name: Bridget

texts.en:
This loan will help Bridget to buy more merchandise to expand her store.

Bridget began her own store-front business, ATAC Inc., three years ago to gain financial independence and pursue her passion of owning her own company. 

Originally from St. Vincent and the Grenadines, Bridget has been in the States since 1993 and is excited to be seeing her dreams come true. She manages the store with the help of her husband, and she hopes to expand the business to a second location in the future. 

Bridget needs a loan to increase inventory and update the equipment in her store.

loans.use: to increase inventory and update equipment.

loans.name: Alphonse

texts.en:
Alphonse is 31 years old. He is married, with two children. He sells foodstuff and has spent four years in the business. 

He has requested the loan to buy more foodstuff, such as sweet potatoes, bananas, and cassava to sell. The profits from the business will be used to make savings.

loans.use: to buy more foodstuff, such as sweet potatoes, bananas, and cassava to sell.

loans.name: Jesse

texts.en:
This loan will help Jesse recover his lost inventory destroyed in Hurricane Sandy.

Jesse, originally from Latvia, is the owner of Shoe Traffic, a shoe and designer clothing retail store. Shoe Traffic has been a landmark for the past 37 years in Sheepshead Bay, an area between Brooklyn and Coney Island that severely suffered from Hurricane Sandy. 

Sheepshead Bay received relief for repairing homes, power lines and infrastructure, but there is little help available for business owners like Jesse who need to regain their lost inventory. 

This loan will help Jesse to buy his lost merchandise so he can continue to serve his clients.

loans.use: to replace the inventory that was destroyed by Hurricane Sandy.

loans.name: Eunia

texts.en:
Eunia serviced her previous loan well, and her business is doing great with good income. She is taking her second loan with KADET LTD which she will use to increase the stock by purchasing more rope, basins, cups, plates and any other goods that might be moving. 

She will use the anticipated profit to move to a better stall in Kakamega town.

She has a dream of becoming a successful business lady, so that she can provide for her family’s basic needs.

loans.use: to buy more rope, plastic basins, cups and plates to sell.

loans.name: Samih

texts.es: Samith de 23 años de edad, se dedica al alquiler de lavadoras en el domicilio donde habita con su cónyuge y su hijo de 8 meses de edad. Su negocio inició,  al ver que varios de sus familiares que habitan en otras localidades, realizan este mismo negocio y les es muy útil para genera ingresos familiares, por eso decidió emprenderlo y agregarle toda su fuerza de trabajo. En la actualidad su negocio está abierto desde las 7 de la mañana, hasta las 8 de la noche, todos los días de la semana, pues tiene como meta principal, generar mas ingresos por concepto de este mismo negocio y para ello debe hacerle crecer su capital de trabajo; esto es justamente la razón por la cual acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará 4 lavadoras mas, con ello aumentarán sus ingresos y mejorará la calidad de vida de su familia y es que este es su principal desafío.
texts.en:
Samith, 23, makes a living renting out washing machines from his home, where he lives with his partner and 8-month-old son. His business began wen he saw that several of his relatives who live in other towns have the same type of business, which is very useful for them in generating an income for their families. Therefore, he decided to start up a business and dedicate all of his efforts to this work. 

Currently, he opens his business from 7am until 8pm every day of the week. His main goal is to generate more income from this business, so he needs to grow his working capital. This is the reason why he has applied for a Kiva loan, which is his first with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. He will use this loan to buy four more washing machines. This will help increase his income and improve his family's quality of life, which is his greatest challenge.

loans.use: to buy four washing machines.

loans.name: Gertulde

texts.en:
Gertulde is 50 years old. She sells different items in her boutique. 

With the loan, she wants to add more corn flour, sugar, soaps, biscuits, and chewing gum to her store. She is anticipating to use the profits to make more savings, for the better future of her businesses.

loans.use: to buy more corn flour, sugar, soaps, biscuits, and chewing gum for her store.

loans.name: Solange

texts.en: Solange is 30 years old, married, and has two children who attend school.  She sells beans and tomatoes. Solange is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy more beans and tomatoes to sell. She plans to add to her savings with the profits from the business.

loans.use: to purchase beans and tomatoes to sell.

loans.name: Pablo Marvin

texts.es:
Pablo de 67 años de edad, casado, es originario de la Paz Centro, lugar que está ubicado en la zona de occidente del país. La paz Centro se caracteriza por sus comidas típicas como el quesillo y el tiste. Pablo es un hombre trabajador, responsables. El cual lo ha demostrado en sus créditos anteriores. Con sus pagos en tiempo y forma. Desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para ayudar con los gastos del hogar. Lamentablemente no pudo estudiar por falta de recursos económicos.
Gracias a su espíritu de salir adelante, tiene por actividad económica la venta de comida casera, desde hace 12 años, y el negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación.  El negocio consiste en vender comida casera, a trabajadores de empresas a jóvenes estudiantes. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabaja y comprar materia prima para elaborar sus comidas como: arroz, frijoles, verduras, carne, pollo, aceite, leña, platos descartables, gaseosas. Actividad que la desempeña con mucho gusto. Pablo agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Pablo is sixty-seven years old, is married, and is originally from La Paz Centro, an area located in the western part of the country.  La Paz Centro is characterized by its typical food, like quesillo (tortilla and cheese) and tiste (milk, cacao, and corn powder drink).  Pablo is a hardworking and responsible man; he has demonstrated this in his past loans in making timely and accurate payments.  

Since he was very young, he has had to work in order to help with home expenses.  Unfortunately, he could not attend school because of scarce economic resources.

Thanks to his spirit to move ahead, he makes a living in selling homemade food.  He has been doing this for twelve years, and the business he has is located in his own home.  His business consists of selling homemade food to businesspeople and to students.  

The use of his loan is to invest in working capital; he will buy the basic ingredients for his foods, like: rice, beans, vegetables, beef, chicken, oil, firewood, disposable plates, and carbonated beverages.  He carries out this activity with great pleasure.

Pablo is thankful for the help that the Kiva investors have offered to people who come from scarce resources and from poor countries like Nicaragua, in order to have a means of dignified work.

loans.use: to invest in working capital by buying basic ingredients to make his homemade dishes, like:  rice, beans, vegetables, beef, chicken, oil, firewood, disposable plates, and carbonated beverages.

loans.name: Banco Mujer Las Luchadoras Group

texts.es: Mileny es una de la integrantes de Banco Mujer Las Luchadoras, tiene 29 años, es casada y tiene 2 hijos menores de edad, estudiantes de primaria. Su esposo trabaja en una pequeña finca bananera como peón agrícola por temporadas, con un salario mínimo. Ella una mujer muy trabajadora, su actividad principal en la cría pollos, pero también para ayudar un poco más a los gastos familiares, elabora pasteles para cumpleaños y otras celebraciones que le encargan vecinos de la comunidad. Este es su tercer crédito, lo va a invertir en compra de pollos y concentrados. Y los anteriores le han permito consolidar su actividad productiva, y ayudar con los estudios de sus hijos y los de ella misma ya que está estudiando en un programa para adultos, concluyendo sus estudios de secundaria, asiste por las noches. Sus aspiraciones son muchas entre ellas están mejorar las condiciones de vida de ella y su familia, y poder ir a la universidad. Mileny, Connie y 6 socias más son las que conforman este grupo y van a invertir en actividades comerciales y pecuarias.
texts.en:
Mileny  is a member of the Las Luchadoras Women's Bank. She is 29 years old, married, and has two children who attend primary school. Her husband works as a seasonal laborer on a banana plantation for minimum wage. She is a hardworking woman whose main job is raising chickens. In addition she makes cakes for birthdays and other celebrations for neighbours to help bring in a little more money.

This is Mileny's third loan, and she plans to use it to buy chickens and feed. Her previous loans helped her consolidate her business and support not only her children through school, but also Mileny herself. She is attending night school in order to complete her secondary education.

She has many hopes for the future. She would like to improve her family's standard of living, and she would like to go to university. 

Mileny, Connie, and six other women are the members of this group. They are going to use the loans in their businesses or in cattle raising.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and chicken feed.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.es: Sabina, es una mujer de carácter. Vive en compañía de su esposo Cesar y su pequeño en una casa alquilada desde hace 3 años. Desde joven aprendió lo necesario en el trabajo agrícola, se acostumbró desde ese momento a trabajar sin descanso durante muchas horas durante el día. Según cuenta en un inicio no contaba con terrenos agrícolas propios por lo que trabajó con mucho esmero para poder comprar uno propio. Con los años se estableció en la ciudad pues siempre soñó con brindar a su familia una mejora calidad de vida, ahora viaja por horas a sus terrenos agrícolas donde trabaja en sus cultivos de papa, maíz y alverja, “me quedo por días en mis terrenos, viajar a la ciudad es muy costoso”, afirma. Sabina desea seguir sembrando y obteniendo ganancias para poder construir su casa propia. En esta oportunidad solicitará 1500 soles lo cual invertira en la compra de un terreno pequeño para poder construir su propia casa. Por ello promete ser puntual y responsable con sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Sabina is a woman of character.  She has lived with her husband Cesar and their small child in a rented house for the past three years.  From a young age she learned the basics of agricultural work and became accustomed to working tirelessly for many hours each day.  In the beginning she owned no land herself but worked with the intention of being able to buy her own property.  Over the years, she became established in the city.  She always dreamed of giving her family a better life.  Today she travels for hours to work in her fields cultivating potatoes, corn and peas.  She asserts: "I stay for days on my land; traveling to the city is expensive."

Sabina wants to continue planting and profiting so that she can afford to build her own home.  She is asking for $600 (1500 soles) which will purchase a small plot on which to build it. She promises to be punctual and responsible with her payments.

loans.use: to purchase a small plot of land.

loans.name: Louise

texts.en:
Louise is 33 years of age. She is married, with three children, aged between one and seven years. Only one of her children attends school. 

Louise sells drinks, especially soft drinks. With the loan, she wants to buy more sodas to sell. The profits will be will be used to upgrade her business.

loans.use: to buy more sodas to sell.

loans.name: San Francisco De Asis Group

texts.es:
El comité San Francisco es de la ciudad de Carapeguá, se encuentra en el 1º ciclo con 11 integrantes,  son señoras trabajadoras que se esmeran en progresar y salir adelante.
La Sra.  Jorgelina que con esfuerzo para sostener los gastos  del hogar trabaja en la artesanía y su actividad secundaria cuenta con una pequeña cantina  en la escuela de su zona por tal motivo es de suma importancia para ella el crédito así podrá  invertir en sus actividades y  generar sus propios ingresos.
Ella quiere poder invertir en su negocio, es por eso que solicita este crédito, ya que quiere comprar golosinas, galletitas, jugos y demás, para poder surtir su cantina.
texts.en:
The San Francisco Communal Bank is located in the city of Carapeguá. This is the first cycle for its eleven members, all hardworking women who do their best to progress and achieve success.

Jorgelina puts her efforts towards her work in handicrafts to cover her household expenses. Her second activity is a small snack bar in the local school. Therefore, this loan is very important to her because she will be able to invest in her business activities and earn her own income.

She would like to invest in her business, which is why she has applied for this loan. She would like to buy candy, cookies, juice and other items to stock her snack bar.

loans.use: to buy candy, cookies, juice and other goods.

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es: Ana Julia de 61 años de edad habita juntos a su esposo y sus hijos, muy conocida por sus vecinos como una mujer trabajadora, emprendedora, capaz de realizar todo aquello que se ponga en mente. Ella se dedica al  cultivo de hortalizas, frijoles, maíz. Además con esfuerzo ha logrado tener un pequeño ganado que le produce leche y es así como ella comercializa todo lo que Dios le provee. Ana julia desea en estas próximas cosechas tener más ganancias pues ya que no cuenta con otros ingresos desea tener lo necesario para que en su hogar nunca falte el pan de cada día. Es pos eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para comprar insumos agrícolas como: fertilizantes, pesticidas, herbicidas, semillas y abonos. Espera contar con la ayuda y de ante mano agradece a Dios por darle esta oportunidad de superación de vida.
texts.en:
Ana Julia, 61, lives with her husband and their children. She is well-known among her neighbors as a hardworking, enterprising woman who is capable of doing anything she puts her mind to. 

She makes a living cultivating vegetables, beans, and corn. With effort, she has also been able to obtain a few cattle which produce milk, so that she can sell all that God has given to her. 

Ana Julia would like to have more income from her next harvests. As she does not have any other source of income, she wishes to have all that is necessary so that her household never lacks its daily bread. Therefore, she has applied for a loan from INTEGRAL to buy farm supplies such as fertilizer, pesticides, herbicides, seeds, and manure. She looks forward to this help, and she thanks God in advance for giving her this opportunity to improve her life.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies such as fertilizer, pesticides, herbicides, seeds, and manure.

loans.name: Benedicta

texts.es:
Vende ropa nueva. Lleva 17 anos en su negocio
Empiezo con su negocio para poder salir adelante
Gracias al apoyo de Fondo Esperanza ha podido surgir y crecer en su negoco. En el futuro tienen como meta comprar una casa e instalar su negocio ahí. Tiene 
4 hijos y dos viven con ella. Ella es separada. Ocupare el prestamos para comprar mercadería para vender ropa de colegio. Lo que le gusta mas de trabajar con Fondo Esperanza es compartir con sus compañeras y poder formar su propio negocio
texts.en:
She sells new clothing, and has been in this business for seventeen years.  She began her business in order to get ahead.

Thanks to the support of Fondo Esperanza, she has been able to initiate and grow her business.  In the future, her goal is to buy a house and to install her business there.

She has four children and two of them live with her.  She is separated.  She will use the loan to buy the merchandise (high school uniforms) that she sells.  The thing she likes most about working with Fondo Esperanza is the camaraderie with her fellow group members, and the ability to form her own business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (high school uniforms) to sell.

loans.name: Evelia Del Socorro

texts.es:
Evelia del Socorro de 49, anos de edad, madre soltera, con dos hijos de 24, 8 años, los dos bajo su responsabilidad, ya que están en estudiando. Es originaria de León, lugar que está ubicado en la zona de occidente del país. Evelia en sus ratos libres le gusta disfrutar de la compañia de sus hijos, y preparles comidas típicas de la región, como el gallo pinto. Lamentablemente no pudo cursar una carrera universitaria, por falta de recursos económico, pero le hubiera gustado mucho, estudiar comercio internacional.
Gracias a su espíritu y sus ganas de salir adelante es que tiene por actividad económica la venta de cosméticos como shampoo, perfumes, cremas, lápiz de ojos, lápiz labial, crema hidratantes, rubor, mascarillas. Actividad que la desempeña de forma ambulante. La rutina de trabajo de Evelia es trabajar unas 9 horas diarias ofreciendo su mercadería con un bulto de unos 20 kg a clientes fijos y eventuales. Actividad que lo desempeña con mucho gusto, ya que ha sido su forma de vida y la de sus hijos. Evelia del Socorro agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Evelia del Socorro, 49, is a single mother with two children aged 8 and 24, who are both under her responsibility given that they are studying. She is originally from León, a city in the western part of Nicaragua. In her free time, Evelia likes to spend her time with her children and prepare traditional regional dishes for them such as the "Gallo pinto".
