Orfelia lives here. She is 62 years old and has a common-law relationship from which she has six adult children. Her daughter lives at home. Her husband works at an eating establishment. 

Orfelia is a housewife who in order to earn her own income and thus be able to help her husband with the household expenses sells Avon (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and accessories for women). She sells from door to door. She works every day. She also has at home a little chicken farm and gets up to 100 chickens each season with which she gets a little extra if she delivers from the house. She has been doing her sales for more than 8 years and with her farm much longer.

This loan is to buy perfumes, creams, and cosmetics, and feed and medicine for the chickens. She has been with the communal bank more than 10 years and she likes it because of the support given through the loans.

Her dreams are to get ahead in life and in business.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams, and cosmetics for her Avon business and chicken feed and medicine for her chicken business

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en: Hussein, a 33-year-old married man with two children, lives in Taiz, Yemen. He has a spice and coffee store. He is a very hardworking and ambitious man. He started his business twelve years ago when he was selling spices on the street. Eventually, he opened a spice store. As Hussein wants to expand his store and start selling new kinds of spices, he applied for a loan of 200,000 YER from Al-Amal Microfinance Bank (AMB). He looks forward to becoming one of the well known spice retailers in Taiz.

loans.use: to purchase spice and coffee products for resale.

loans.name: Miriam  Del  Rosario

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal Amistad, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.

En este lugar vive la señora Miriam, tiene 36 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 16, 11 y 3 años de edad,  las dos mayores estudian en colegio y escuela. Su esposo es comerciante.

Doña Miriam junto con su esposo tienen un negocio de venta de ropa y bisutería, ellos instalan un puesto en el centro de la ciudad en el cual ofrecen sus productos, trabajan todos los  días desde las 8h00 hasta las 18h00,  venden al contado y a crédito pero solo a clientes que son bien conocidos,  para surtirse de mercadería su esposo viaja cada quince días a la ciudad de Guayaquil lugar donde consigue más variedad y a mejor precio. Tienen 9 años con su negocio y les va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar ropa de todo tipo y genero, además bisutería. Lleva 8 años  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos les ayudan a financiar su negocio.

Su sueño es tener un almacén con un local fijo.
texts.en:
In the city of Tosagua the Banco Comunal Amistad meets every 15 days.  This city is known to be dynamic, where the majority of its citizens make a living in agriculture and also raise animals, as it is region with great vegetation.  

Miriam lives here.  She is 36 years old, married, and has three children aged 16, 11 and 3.  The two eldest are students.  

Her husband is a merchant.  Miriam has a business with her husband where they sell clothing and costume jewelry.  The have a post in the city center, where they offer their products.  They work every day from 8:00am until 6:00pm, selling for cash and on credit (but the latter only to those customers they know well).

To stock their merchandise, her husband travels every 15 days to the city of Guayaquil - a place where they can get the greatest variety at the best prices.

They have been at this business for nine years and it is going very well for them.  This loan will be used to buy all types of clothing for both genders, as well as costume jewelry.

They have been associated with Banco Comunal for eight years and they like it because the loans help them to finance their business.  Her dream is to open a store in a permanent location.

loans.use: to buy clothing and costume jewelry.

loans.name: Ahmed

texts.en: Ahmed is a 47-year-old married man with six children. He lives in the city of Taiz. He is a hardworking man and works for long hours to earn more money. He has been working in a sponge factory for more than ten years. He had saved money to start building his own house, but unfortunately, he was unable to complete the construction due to financial problems. Therefore, he is asking for a loan of 100,000 YER to pay for construction supplies. Ahmed looks forward to improving his family's living conditions and to building another house and renting it out.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies.

loans.name: Saher Group

texts.en:
Saher Group consists of four women from Taiz, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 120,000 Yemeni rials (YER) to buy home appliances.

Saher, a 29-year-old single woman, lives with her family in the city of Taiz and is the leader of the group. She is a secondary school graduate. Because of their financial problems, she couldn’t complete her education and join university. She had a sewing training course from one of the charities beside her house. Saher wants to start up a business. She wants to be a seamstress, but she doesn’t have a sewing machine; therefore, she asked for a loan of 30,000 YER. She hopes that this business will make good profit to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for purchasing a sewing machine.

loans.name: Gullanpugro  (Nabón) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Gullanpugro se encuentra conformado por 8 socias quienes viven por el sector de Gullanpugro en el cantón de Nabon, lugar que es de clima frió, tiene varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza, su centro cantonal nos traslada al pasado. Su gente mantiene la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos, lo más precioso que llevan es su vestimenta, se dedican a la crianza de animales, a la agricultura.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Lidia, se encuentra realizando su segundo crédito en el banco comunal Gullanpugro. Tiene 38 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 5 hijos de 18, 15, 13, 14 y 2 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en un colegio a distancia, trabaja y le ayuda económicamente, sus tres hijos siguientes  estudian en un colegio de la localidad. Su esposo se dedica a laborar como jornalero, la casa en la que vive es de propia.

Doña Lidia se dedica a las labores diarias de su hogar, pero siempre está en búsqueda de mejorar su situación económica se dedica a la cría y venta de cuyes, gallinas, ganado y cerdos, también labora en la agricultura y sus cosechas las vende en la ciudad de Cuenca. 

Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de semillas, abono y alimento para sus animales.

Su meta es hacer viveros en sus terrenos.
texts.en:
The communal bank Gullanpugro is made up of 8 members who live in the area of Gullanpugro in the canton of Nabon. This is a place with cold weather. It has many places to enjoy nature. Its cantonal center transports us to the past. Its people maintain the culture and traditions of their ancestors, and most charming is that they continue to dress as in the past. They work in livestock and agriculture.

One of the members of this group is Lidia. She is taking a second loan with the communal bank Gullanpugro. She is 38 years old, married and has 5 children who are 18, 15, 13, 14 and 2 years old. Her first son studies at school some distance away. She works and financially supports her three sons to continue studying at a local school.

Her husband works as a day laborer. She lives in her own home. Lidia does the daily household chores but she is always in search to improve the financial situation by engaging in raising and selling guinea pigs, chickens, cattle and pigs. She also works in agriculture and she sells her crops in the city of Cuenca.

She will use her loan to invest in the purchase of seed, fertilizer and feed for the animals.

Her goal is to have nurseries on her land.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizer and animal feed.

loans.name: Abdullah

texts.en: Abdullah, a 45-year-old married man, lives with his six children in a rented house in Taiz, Yemen. He owns a grocery store. He started off by working in a grocery store and eventually accumulated money and opened his own. As Abdullah wants money to purchase food products for his store, he has asked for a loan of 200,000 YER from Al-Amal Microfinance Bank (AMB). He hopes to improve his family's living conditions and become a merchant.

loans.use: to purchase food products for his store.

loans.name: Moath

texts.en: Moath, a 33-year-old married man, lives with his five children in a rented house in Taiz, Yemen. He owns a grocery store. He began by selling food products in the street four years ago. He accumulated money and then opened his own grocery store. As Moath wants money to purchase food products for his store, he has asked for a loan of 150,000 YER from Al-Amal Microfinance Bank (AMB). He hopes to improve his family's living conditions, become a merchant and have his own house.

loans.use: to purchase food products for his store.

loans.name: Yusuf Group

texts.en: Yusuf Group is a group of four women from Taiz, Yemen. They have asked for a loan of 170,000 YER to pay for home appliances. Amani, a 25-year-old married woman, is the leader of the group. She lives in Taiz with her husband. They left their parents' house and moved into a new apartment. They want to start their own life and completely depend on themselves. Amani's husband works very much and does his best to pay for the rent and food. She decided to help her husband and wants to buy home appliances gradually. As she wants to buy a fridge, she has applied for a loan of 50,000 YER. Amani hopes that after two years, her house will be completely furnished.

loans.use: to pay for home appliances.

loans.name: Jameil Group

texts.en: Jameil Group consists of five women from Taiz, Yemen. They have asked for a loan of 100,000 YER to pay for carpentry. Refiqa, who is 27 years old, is a married woman who lives with her family in Taiz. She is the leader of the group. She has been accumulating money for a few years and is now constructing a small room. She needs to buy the windows and door of the room, but she has no money left. She has therefore applied for a loan of 20,000 YER. She hopes to be able to open a savings account for her family members after finishing the room construction.

loans.use: to pay for the windows and door of a room.

loans.name: Dallal Al-Hodeida Group

texts.en:
Dallal AL-Hodeida is a group of four poor women from Al-Hodeida, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 80,000 YER to pay for purchasing woman's clothes.

Dalal, a 37-year-old married woman, lives with her children in a small house in Al-Hodeida city. Her husband went abroad two years ago to work in Saudi Arabia. Since then, she decided to work and earn money to cover the needs of her children. She is a door-to-door women's clothing saleswoman. She  sells "dera'a", a traditional Yemeni dress. Dalal earned a good profit from this business, so she decided to purchase more clothes and target new clients. Therefore, she asked for a loan in the amount of 20,000 YER. Dalal looks forward to opening a clothing store in the near future.

loans.use: to pay for purchasing women's clothes

loans.name: Jamal Al-Hodeida Group

texts.en:
Jamal Al-Hodeida is a group of four poor women from Al-Hodeida,Yemen. They asked for a 80,000 YER from AMB to pay for the purchase of clothes for resale.

Shoa'iah is a 49-year-old uneducated married woman with eight children from Al-Hodeida. She started her business selling clothes two months ago to help her husband pay for her family's living expenses. Living expenses have increased rapidly in Yemen, especially in the last two years. The number of poor people has increased. Shoa'iah decided to help her hardworking husband and become a door-to-door women's and kids' clothing seller. She needs capital to purchase more clothes for resale, so she applied for a loan in the amount of 20,000 YER as part of the group. Shoa'iah hopes to improve her family's living standards and enroll her children in high quality universities and schools.

loans.use: to pay for purchasing clothes for resale

loans.name: Ala'a Group

texts.en:
Ala'a group consists of five women from Al-Hodeida, Yemen. They have requested for a loan of 100,000 YER to pay for the purchase of clothes, perfumes, incense and henna.

Madrah, a 35-year-old married woman with four children, is the leader of the group. She lives with her family. She had started up a business selling boiled potatoes in a street market two years ago when her husband became unable to pay for essential living expenses. This business was profitable. She then moved into selling women's clothes. Madrah wants to expand her business. She plans to sell perfumes, incense and henna in addition to the clothes, so she applied for a loan in the amount of 20,000 YER. Madrah looks forward to opening a store for selling clothes and cosmetics.

loans.use: to pay for purchasing clothes, perfumes, incense and henna

loans.name: Al-Arham Group

texts.en:
The Al-Arham group consists of 4 women who live in Sana'a, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 180,000 YER from AMB.

Fatima, 30 years old, is married and has children who live in Sana'a. She is a housewife who takes care of her family. She washes her clothes at the laundry because she doesn't have money to buy a washing machine. Fatima has requested a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB to buy a washing machine for the house. She hopes to improve her living standards.

loans.use: to buy a washing machine for the house.

loans.name: Al-Doa Group

texts.en: The Al-Doa group consists of 4 ladies who live in Sana`a, Yemen. Najah is a 38-year-old married woman who has 8 children and who needs to improve her living standards. She is a hardworking woman. Her fridge is not working, and she does not have enough money to buy a fridge. Therefore, she applied for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB.

loans.use: to buy a fridge for personal use.

loans.name: Dina Group

texts.en: Dina is a group of three women and one man from Taiz, Yemen. They asked for a loan of 80.000 YER to purchase sheep for resale. Zaineb is a 28 year-old illiterate married woman with three children. She lives with her children and husband. Their only source of income comes from raising and selling livestock. She wants to buy more sheep and resell them to earn more money. She applied for a loan of 20.000 YER. Zaineb hopes to expand her business to help her husband and improve her family’s living standards.

loans.use: to purchase sheep for resale.

loans.name: Ghazal Group

texts.en:
Ghazal group consists of five women from Al Hodeida, Yemen. They asked for a loan of 100,000 YER to pay for sewing accessories.

Lolah is a 31-year-old married woman with three children who lives with her family in Al Hodeida. She has been working as a dressmaker for three years to help her husband pay for living expenses. She wants to buy sewing accessories to be able to meet the demands of her clients, so she applied for a loan in the amount of 20,000 YER. Lolah hopes to open a store for women's hand bags and wool clothes.

loans.use: to pay for sewing accessories

loans.name: Taisyr

texts.en: Taisyr is a 31-year-old married man with three children who lives in Taiz, Yemen with his loving family. He started his bakery business two years ago and it is the only source of income for him and his family. He has attracted more clients. He thanks Kiva for his first loan last year. Due to the current situation in Yemen, he still faces difficulty with the lack of gas, thus he has less profits than expected from his enterprise. He took a loan of 300,000 YER to buy more bakery items such as flour, and to also buy gas used to distribute the bread to the many shops. In the future, he hopes to expand his business and make cakes and open an automatic bakery.

loans.use: to purchase bakery items such as flour and also gas used to deliver bread.

loans.name: Bassam

texts.en:
Bassam, a 38-year-old married man, lives in Taiz, Yemen. He has a Bachelor degree but like most university graduates in third-world countries, Bassam did not find a professional job.  He decided to start up his own business, a grocery store. He is a symbol of an ambitious, optimistic young person. 

His business started six years ago when he was selling food in the street. A few years later, he opened his grocery store. Bassam wants to purchase new types of food products to meet the needs of his customers. He asked for a loan in the amount of 350,000 YER. Bassam looks forward to becoming a merchant and an authorized agent for food companies in Yemen.

loans.use: to purchase new types of  food products for this grocery store.

loans.name: Al-Hasna'a Group

texts.en:
Al-Hasna'a is a group of four women from Taiz, Yemen. They have applied for a loan of 100,000 YER to buy construction supplies.
Hasna'a is 38 years old, uneducated, and married with six children. She is building a small room to expand her house. Her husband did his best to accumulate money to start construction. She needs money to buy timber for roofing, so she has asked for a loan of 30,000 YER. She hopes that she will be able to renovate her old house after finishing construction of the room.

loans.use: to pay for construction supplies

loans.name: Ohoad Group

texts.en:
Ohoad is a group of four women from Al-Hodeida, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 80,000 YER to buy a collection of clothes for resale.

Naema, a 27-year-old uneducated married woman, lives in Al-Hodeida city. She is a cooperative wife. She wants to help her hard-working husband to pay the family's living expenses. Her husband gave her capital to start up a business selling clothes five years ago. This really helped the family to improve their living conditions. 

Naema wants to start expanding her business and target new clients in different quarters, so she asked for a loan of an amount of 20,000 YER to buy a new collection of clothes. Naema looks forwards to starting to sell cosmetics in addition to clothes.

loans.use: to purchase a collection of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Mohsen

texts.en:
Mohsen, age 49, is a retired soldier. He and his wife have six children and live in Taiz, Yemen. The large family resides in a rented apartment.

Mohsen cannot afford to buy furniture because his main concern is to cover rent and food for the family. His limited monthly income does not stretch far enough to cover other family needs. For this reason, he has applied for a loan in the amount of 100,000 YER. He will use his loan funds to buy much-needed furniture for the home.

Mohsen hopes that he can eventually own a house for the family to live in.

loans.use: to buy furniture for the family home

loans.name: Al-Nabil Group

texts.en:
Al-Nabil is a group of four women from Taiz, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 120,000 YER to pay for construction supplies.
Ifraq, a 30-year-old married woman with four children, is the leader of the group. She lives with her family in the city of Taiz. She accumulated a considerable amount money for the last few years to build her own house. They started constructing the house, and they are in the last steps to complete the building. She needs now to buy doors, windows, room paint, and bath accessories. She has some money, but it is not enough. Therefore, she asked for a loan of 30.000 YER from AMB. Ifraq hopes to finish the construction and open saving accounts for her family members.

loans.use: to pay for carpentry and painting

loans.name: Al-Wad Group

texts.en: The Al-Wad group consists of five ladies who live in Sana`a, Yemen. Wafa is a 26-year-old married woman who has two children and who needs to improve her living standards. She is a hardworking woman. Her washing machine is not working and nobody around her area can help lend her anything to buy a new one. Unforutunately, her money is not enough to buy it. Therefore, she applied for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB. She hopes to improve her living standards.

loans.use: to buy a washing machine for home use.

loans.name: Yasmeen Group

texts.en:
Yasmeen group consists of four women from Al-Hodeida, Yemen. They asked for a loan of 80.000YER to pay for purchasing woman's clothes, perfumes and incense.

Fatemah, is 38 years-old, and an  illiterate married woman with five children. She lives with her family in the city of Al-Hodeida. Her family conditions are bad so she has to help her husband in paying for all living expenses. She is a door-to-door seller. She has been selling clothes for about a year. This business is making a good profit so she decided to expand her business and start selling perfumes and incense. Therefore, she applied for a loan in the amount of 20.000YER from AMB.

loans.use: to pay for purchasing clothes, perfumes and incense.

loans.name: Gaza  Al-Hodeida Group

texts.en:
Gaza Al-Hodeida is a group of four poor women from Al-Hodeida, Yemen.  They applied for a loan of 80,000 YER to purchase woman's clothes.

Lolah, a 43-year-old married woman, lives with her thirteen children in a small house in Al-Hodeida city. Her husband went abroad two years ago to work in Saudi Arabia when he couldn’t afford to pay for his family needs due to his low monthly income. He thought that he would make much more money abroad.

Lolah decided to work to earn money to cover the needs of her children. She is a door-to-door woman's clothing seller. She sells woman's and kids clothes. She earned a good profit from this business, so she decided to purchase more clothes and target new clients. Therefore, she asked for a loan in the amount of 20,000 YER. Lolah hopes to expand her business and open a clothing store in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase woman's clothes

loans.name: Al-Shmoa Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Shmoa which consists of 4 ladies who live in Sana`a, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 130000 YER from AMB.

Salama is 30 years old, married, and has 2 children who live in Sana`a, Yemen. She is a hardworking woman that provides for her family. She has old washing machine and she wants to buy new one but she doesn`t have enough money. She listened to her friends about AMB so she is requesting a loan of 30,000 YER from AMB.

loans.use: to buy a washing machine for personal use.

loans.name: Al-Zkria Group

texts.en:
The Al-zkria group consists of 4 women who live in Sana'a, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 140,000 YER from AMB.
 
Hana, 29 years old, is married and has two children who live in Sana'a. She is a housewife who takes care of her family. She would like to spend her leisure time watching television. She doesn`t have enough money so, she has requested a loan of 30,000 YER from AMB to buy a television for the house. She hopes to improve her living standards.

loans.use: to buy a television to use for the house.

loans.name: Maheob

texts.en: Maheob, 55 years old, is married and lives with his five children in the city of Taiz, Yemen. He is an elementary school graduate and works in roads maintenance. Maheob's monthly income, like most public sector workers, is very low. His house needs immediate renovation and he has already started the work but is short of money now. Maheob therefore applied for a loan of 199,999.92 YER to pay for the renovation expenses. He hopes that he will be able to live safely in his house after it is renovated.

loans.use: to pay for house renovation expenses

loans.name: Justina

texts.es: Justina tiene 44 años de edad y nació  en la ciudad del Cusco, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Naupasunchis” de la ciudad del Cusco. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de diferentes tipos de productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, fideos  y otras cosas más. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería tal como sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar y otras cosas más. Esta feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Justina, age 44, was born in the city of Cusco.  She belongs to the Naupasunchis communal bank is the city of Cusco.

Her main business activity is selling different types of basic needs products like rice, sugar, noodles, and other things.

At this time she needs the loan to buy merchandise like sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, and more.  She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, and more.

loans.name: Taha

texts.en: Taha, a 37-year-old married man with two children, lives in the city of Taiz, Yemen. He is a secondary school graduate. He is a symbol of ambition and industry. He is a worker in the General Organization for Roads and Bridges. During more than seven years, he was able to buy a small piece of land and build a small house. Taha is ready to leave a rented house and move into his own house, but he has no money left to pay for furniture; therefore, he applied for a loan in the amount of 100,000 YER to pay for his new house furniture. Taha looks forward to continuing accumulating money to build the second floor and rent it, and to open a grocery store.

loans.use: to pay for furinture

loans.name: Emily Dayana

texts.es:
La socia es la señora Emily,la socia pertenece al banco comunal RUMBO AL EXITO-SANTIAGO, la socia continua con su negocio de venta de cerveza,gaseosas entre otros,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia. 
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de cerveza para su negocio.

La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Emily belongs to the “Rumbo al Éxito-Santiago” communal bank.  She continues with her business selling beer and soft-drinks, among others.  She’s been in this business for years and does well thanks to the effort she puts into it daily.  She’s a responsible, enterprising person and this is the way she supports her family.  She’s asking for the loan to buy beer for her business.  She’s grateful for the loan granted and commits to make her payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy beer.

loans.name: Olinda

texts.es: Olinda tiene 38 años de edad y nació  en la ciudad del Cusco ella es madre y padre para sus dos hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Naupasunchis” de la ciudad del Cusco. Su actividad económica principal es brindar servicio de hospedaje. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento de las habitaciones entonces va pintar las paredes. Esta feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Olinda is 38 years old and was born in the city of Cusco. She is both the mother and father for her two children. She belongs to the communal bank "Naupasunchis" in the city of Cusco. 

Her principal economic activity is offering a lodging service. At this moment she requires a loan to perform maintenance on the guest rooms. She plans to paint the walls. 

She is happy to receive the loan and is committed to fulfilling the payment quotas.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on guest rooms by painting the walls

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: Maria tiene 65 años de edad y nació  en la ciudad de Curahuasi pero vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco, ella tiene una relación  de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Naupasunchis” de la ciudad del Cusco. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de ropa. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como pantalones, polos, chompas, casacas, y otras cosas más. Esta feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Maria, 65, was born in the city of Curahuasi but lives in the beautiful city of Cusco.  She has a common-law husband and a son, and belongs to the communal bank "Naupasunchis" in Cusco.  Her main source of income is selling clothing.  She is requesting a loan on this occasion to buy merchandise such as pants, polo shirts, sweaters, jackets and other items.  She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy merchandise such as pants, polo shirts, sweaters, jackets and other items.

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es: Pablo tiene 50 años de edad y nació  en la ciudad del Cusco, él tiene una relación  de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, él pertenece al banco comunal “Naupasunchis” de la ciudad del Cusco. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de zapatos. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar zapatos. Esta feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Pablo, 50, was born in the city of Cusco.  He’s in a free union and has two children.  He belongs to the “Naupasunchis” communal bank in Cusco.  His main economic activity is selling shoes.  On this occasion he needs the loan to buy shoes.  He’s happy about the loan and commits to make his installment payments.

loans.use: to buy shoes.

loans.name: Paulina Line

texts.es: Paulina tiene 53 años de edad y nació  en la ciudad de Curahuasi pero vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco, ella tiene una relación  de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Naupasunchis” de la ciudad del Cusco. Su actividad económica principal es brindar servicio de hospedaje. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento de las habitaciones. Esta feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Paulina, 53, was born in the city of Curahuasi but lives in the beautiful city of Cusco.  She’s in a free union and has a son.  She belongs to the “Naupasunchis” communal bank in Cusco.  Her main economic activity is providing lodging services.  On this occasion she needs the loan to repair the rooms.  She’s happy for the loan and committed to making her installment payments.

loans.use: to repair the rooms.

loans.name: Ilucion Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por seis socias exitosas una de ellas es Jesica es una mujer su estado civil unión libre, de 33 años de edad y con cuatro hijos menores de edad. Tiene cinco años de dedicarse a vender ropa usada, cosméticos de la Avon, ella inicia vendiendo perfumen poco a poco con sus ganancias fue diversificando sus productos, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra  de ropa usada de pacas, Fátima Lorena vende de ropa nueva, Karla vende café con cremora, café con leche el portón de la Universidad del país, María vende ropa usada y ropa nueva, Concepción tiene un pequeño taller de costura donde fabrica ropa de cama, bolsos, almohada, cojines grandes, cojines pequeños y Dominga vende ropa, nacatamales los fines de semanas.
texts.en:
This group has six successful members.   One of them is Jesica, 33.  She’s in a free union and has four minor children.  She’s been selling used clothes and Avon cosmetics for five years.  She started out selling perfume and gradually used profits to diversify her products.  She will use the loan to buy a bale of used clothes.

Fátima Lorena sells new clothes, Karla sells coffee with Cremora and coffee with milk at the gates of one of the country’s universities, María sells new and used clothes, Concepción has a small sewing workshop where she manufactures bed linens, bags, pillows, large and small cushions and Dominga sells clothes and on the weekends, nacatamales [Nicaraguan-style tamales].

loans.use: to buy a bale of used clothes.

loans.name: Betty

texts.es: Betty tiene 30 años de edad y nació  en la ciudad de Curahuasi pero vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco, ella tiene una relación  de unión libre de la cual tiene una hija, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Naupasunchis” de la ciudad del Cusco. Su actividad económica principal es brindar servicio de  masajes. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para uso personal para alimentación y educación. Esta feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Betty iss 30-years-old.  She was born in the city of Curahuasi but lives in the beautiful city of Cusco.  She’s in a free union and has a daughter.  She belongs to the “Naupasunchis” communal bank in the city of Cusco.  Her main economic activity is giving massages.  On this occasion she needs a personal use loan for food and education.  She’s happy with the loan and committed to make her installment payments.

loans.use: for food and education.

loans.name: Rodolfo

texts.es: Rodolfo tiene 33 años de edad y nació  en la ciudad del Cusco, él tiene una relación  de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, él pertenece al banco comunal “Naupasunchis” de la ciudad del Cusco. Su actividad económica principal es la administración de un hospedaje. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para uso personal para gastos familiares pagar recibos de la luz, agua, alimentación, educación y otras cosas. Esta feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Rodolfo is 33 years old and he was born in the city of Cusco. He has a domestic partner and they have two children. Rodolfo belongs to the Naupasunchis Communal Bank in Cusco. His main job is managing a guest lodging. Rodolfo is requesting the loan to pay for personal expenses for his family  including electricity, water, food, education and other things. He is very happy about the loan and promises to pay it back on time.

loans.use: to pay personal expenses for his family like electricity, water, food, education and other things.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es: La señora Beatriz tiene 30 años tiene estudios a nivel primario, trabajo desde muy joven por esta razón no pudo culminar sus estudios, se casó a corta edad tiene 4 dependientes, ella se dedica a la producción de piña, pero también en el trayecto de su vida estudio costura elabora prendas de vestir como ser polleras, blusas y otros, en los últimos años para mejorar los ingresos de la familia el esposo se fue a España, ella quedo a cargo de la familia, y a pesar de los esfuerzos de toda la familia no lograron reunir el dinero suficiente para la construcción de la vivienda por esta razón doña Beatriz solicita el préstamo, para poder culminar su vivienda que es muy necesaria para acoger a toda su familia, y mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos.
texts.en: Beatriz, 30, attended elementary school.  She’s worked since she was very young which is why she was unable to complete her schooling.  She was married young and has four dependents.  She works growing pineapple but during her life has also learned to sew and manufactures articles of clothing like skirts, blouses and others.  In order to improve family income, her husband went to Spain a few years ago and she’s now in charge of the family.  Despite the entire family’s efforts, they are unable to earn enough money to build their house which is why Beatriz is requesting the loan to finish her house which she needs to do in order to house her entire family and improve her children’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Tereza De Jesus

texts.es: Doña Tereza es una mujer emprendedora de 71 años de edad, soltera tiene más de 28 años de ser comerciante y dedicarse a vender ropa variada unisex, para todas las edades en su comunidad y barrios cercanos a su comunidad, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de ropa variada unisex como camisas, pantalón de varón, pantalón de mujer, camisetas, ropa interior de mujer, ropa interior de varón.
texts.en: Tereza’s an enterprising, 71-year-old single woman.  She’s been a merchant for more than 28 years.  She sells unisex clothes for all ages in her community and in neighborhoods near her community.  She will use the loan to buy varied unisex clothes like shirts, men’s pants, women’s pants, t-shirts and underwear for men and women.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Francisco Arturo

texts.es:
“Juzgar es el arma que utilizan los fracasados” con esta frase Francisco de 43 años de edad,cuenta como ha sido víctima de personas mal intencionadas que han querido manchar su buen nombre. Sin darle mucha importancia a los sucesos que han querido obstaculizar su camino, sigue adelante luchando por sacar adelante su negocio y ofrecerle a sus padres mejores condiciones de vida, debido a que él es quien vela por ellos. Todos los días inicia su faena de nueve de la mañana a seis de la tarde. 
Su mayor sueño es poder comprar su propio local y ahorrarse los gastos de arrendamiento. Desea poder mejorar sus ventas y para esto, se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de calzado escolar, con el fin de aprovechar el regreso a clases.
texts.en:
“To judge is the weapon of those who fail.”  With this phrase, Francisco, 43, relates how he’s been the victim of evil-doers who have sought to stain his good name.  Not giving much importance to happenings that have tried to be obstacles in his path, he continues forward striving to move his business ahead and to offer his parents better living conditions since he must care for them.  He starts his work day at nine in the morning and goes until six in the evening.  

His greatest dream is to be able to buy his own store and save on rent.  He wants to improve sales and to do so is asking for a loan he’ll use to buy shoes for school to take advantage of back to school season.

loans.use: to buy shoes for school.

loans.name: Colibri Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras de éxito una de ellas es Mirna de 32 años casada, cuatro hijos de 3, 5,8, y 2años de edad todos menores, su negocio es de venta de artesanías con cinco años de experiencias. El crédito lo  invertirá en la compra de adornos de artesanías como platos, sol, luna, perra pequinés, perro echado, toro, florero, casitas, textos bíblicos etc. Karla tiene una pulpería en su domicilio, echa tortilla vende cuajaditas, queso, gaseosas etc. y Johana tiene una pulpería en su domicilio.
texts.en: This group is made up of three successful, enterprising members. Mirna, 32, is married and has four children, aged 3, 5, 8, and 2. Her business is selling artisan crafts and she has five years of experience. She will use the loan to purchase artisan decorations like plates, suns, moons, Pekingese dogs, dogs lying down, bulls, vases, little houses, biblical texts, etc. Karla has a small grocery store in her home. She makes tortillas, and sells cuajaditas (a dessert made with milk curds), cheese, soft drinks, etc. Johana has a small grocery store in her home.

loans.use: to buy artisan decorations, such as plates, suns, moons, Pekingese dogs, dogs lying down, bulls, vases, little houses, biblical texts, etc.

loans.name: Nelson

texts.es: El cliente, Nelson, es un señor de 36 años de edad, está casado con la señora Consuelo. El sr.  Nelson se dedica al servicio de seguridad como policía, y también genera ingresos extras con el servicio de transporte en la ciudad de Cochabamba, actualmente vive por la zona oeste de la ciudad, aproximadamente a 7 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba, la casa donde vive no es propia, vive con su esposa en alquiler, ambos tienen 1 hijo dependiente y el destino del presente crédito es para la refacción de su vivienda que tienen en el campo, (techo para tinglado para sus vacas), la cual ya está muy desgastada por el transcurso del tiempo y por la humedad  de las lluvias constantes, y la vivienda ya necesita hacer el respectivo mantenimiento. El sr. Nelson se encuentra muy feliz de poder tener esta oportunidad.
texts.en:
Nelson is a 36 year old man; he is married to Consuelo. Nelson works in security as a policeman, and he also earns extra income through his transportation service in the city of Cochabamba. 

Currently, he loves in the western part of the city, approximately 7 kilometers from the city of Cochabamba. The house where he lives doesn’t belong to him; he rents it with his wife. 

They have one dependent son, and the current loan will be used to refurbish the home that he has in the country and a roof for a shed for his cows, which by now is worn out from the passage of time and the moisture from the constant rain. The home needs comparable maintenance.

Nelson is very glad to be able to have this opportunity.

loans.use: to refurbish his house.

loans.name: Las Reunidas Group

texts.es:
Grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ella es Danelia que vende ropa nueva variada, desde hace 4 años, es soltera y tiene 24 años de edad.
El crédito lo  invertirá en la compra de ropa nueva, variada, Marling vende ropa interior por catálogo, cosméticos y  María de Lourdes tiene un pequeño taller de costura y vende ropa usada.
texts.en:
This group consists of three enterprising members. One of whom is Danelia; she sells new and assorted clothing. She has been doing this for four years. She is 24 years old and single. 

She will use this loan to buy new and assorted clothing. As for the other members, Marling sells underwear through catalog sales, and María has a small sewing workshop and sells used clothing.

loans.use: to buy new and assorted clothing such as men's shirts and pants, and women's shirts and pants,

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es: Doña Marcelina, tiene 46 años de edad, su familia está compuesta por tres miembros: dos hijos y la madre, es de una familia humilde de escasos recursos económicos, viven en la comunidad de Tako Tako Alto del municipio de Mizque, del departamento de Cochabamba. Trabaja en la agricultura y la pecuaria, produce papa, frejol y cebolla; los comercializa en el mismo lugar donde vive a los comerciantes de la misma población de Mizque. Doña Marcelina es una persona muy respetada en su comunidad, por la dedicación a su trabajo y por ser la responsable de la alimentación y la educación de su familia. Tienen una vivienda de paredes de adobe, techo de cañaweca y revoque de barro, esta clase de vivienda cada año antes de las lluvias hay que hacer el revoque. Doña Marcelina, está solicitando el presente crédito para comprar más semillas, abonos y agroquímicos  para tener más producción y de esta forma mejorar las condiciones de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en:
Marcelina is 46 years old. Her family consists of three members: the mother and two children. It is a humble family of limited financial resources. They live in the community of Tako Tako Alto in the Mizque municipality of the Cochabamba region. She works in agriculture and with livestock. She grows potatoes, beans, and onions. She sells them in the same place where the traders live in Mizque. 

Marcelina is a very respected person in her community because of her work and being responsible for the feeding and educating of her family. They have a home with adobe walls, a thatched roof, and earth plaster. With this type of home, one must make the plaster every year before the rains. Marcelina is requesting this loan to buy more seeds, fertilizers, and agrochemicals to have a better harvest, and in this way, improve the standard of living for her whole family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, and agrochemicals.

loans.name: Las Chicas Group

texts.es: Este es un grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ella es Jaquelin tiene 30 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos de 1 y 12 años de edad. Hace 18 meses inicio con su pulpería anteriormente vendía prendas de oro marca zafiro, con sus utilidades fue poco a poco comprando productos de pulpería hasta lograr su meta, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de productos de pulperías como granos básicos arroz, aceite, frijoles, azúcar, carne de res, carne de pollo, productos lácteos, productos de la delmor, jabón de lavar, jabón de baño, cosméticos populares, medicamentos populares etc. Marlene vende calzados por catálogos y Marlene del Socorro tiene una pulpería en su domicilio.
texts.en:
This is a group of three enterprising members.  One of them is Jaquelin, 30.  She’s married and has two children who are 1 and 12 years of age.  She opened a grocery store 18 months ago.  She used to sell gold jewelry items of the Zafiro brand and used profits to gradually buy grocery items until she reached her goal.  She will use the loan to buy grocery items like basic grains, rice, oil, beans, sugar, beef, chicken, dairy products, Delmor brand products, laundry soap, bath soap, popular cosmetics, popular medicine, etc.

Marlene sells shoes via catalog and Marlene del Socorro has a home-based grocery store.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Diana Del Socorro

texts.es: Diana es una mujer emprendedora de 35 años de edad, acompañada, con un hijo, se dedica a vender vigoron y refrescos naturales desde hace 10 años en un puesto fijo  de nuestra capital, ella misma atiende su negocio, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima como yuca, chicharrón, fritos de cerdo, repollo, tomate, remolacha, leña, pepino etc.
texts.en:
Diana is an enterprising woman who is 35 years old. She lives with a partner and a child. 

She has been selling vigoron (a traditional Nicaraguan dish which consists of cabbage, cassava, and pork rinds with spices) and natural beverages for 10 years for people from the capital city. She herself tends to the business. 

She will invest the loan in the purchase of staples such as cassava, pork rinds, fried pork, cabbage, tomatoes, beets, cucumber, firewood, etc.

loans.use: to buy staples such as cassava, pork rinds, fried pork, cabbage, tomatoes, beets, cucumbers, firewood, etc. to be used in her food stall.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: El señor Juan de 59 años de edad  casado, vive junto a su familia, son de escasos recursos económicos sus hijos tuvieron que emigrar al extranjero y hasta ahora no saben mucho de ellos quedándose a cargo de sus nietos don Juan se dedica exclusivamente a la agricultura y en tiempos libres trabaja como jornalero en diferentes parcelas de su comunidad y así poder traer unos pesos más a la familia, en la anterior cosecha tuvo problemas climáticos  de sequía y en los últimos días ha sufrido la escases de agua de riego,  por efecto las parcelas de cebolla,  papa y frejol han bajado de rendimiento haciendo que la producción sea mínima e hizo fracasar en sus ingresos económicos a la familia que se mantenían con la producción agrícola que cada año producen principalmente cebolla, papa  y frejol.  Juan es una persona  muy querida y respetada en el lugar donde vive, por lo dedicado a su trabajo de la agricultura, con el cual saca adelante a su familia, él  está solicitando el crédito para comprar abono orgánico y de esta manera mejorar la producción de sus cultivos. Don juan trabaja en pequeñas parcelas con su esposa, también tiene la mentalidad que con este crédito mejorará las condiciones de sus cultivos y también mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Juan is 59 years old, married, and lives with his family. They have scarce economic resources. His children have had to emigrate abroad and until the present, Juan knows little about them. Left in charge of his grandchildren, Juan works exclusively in agriculture. In his free time, he works as a day laborer in different parcels in his community, in order to bring in more pesos for his family.
 
During the last harvest, there were climate problems -- a drought -- and recently there has been a shortage of water for irrigation. As a result, his parcels of onions, potatoes, and beans have suffered reduced production. The harvest has been minimal, resulting in a collapse of income for a family that depends on agricultural production each year, principally on onions, potatoes, and beans.

Juan is a much loved and respected person in his community, due to his dedication in pursuing his agricultural labors, on which he depends to advance his family. He is soliciting a loan to buy organic fertilizer and, in this manner, to improve his crop's production. Juan cultivates small parcels with his wife. He believes this loan will improve the condition of his crops and, also, his family's conditions of life.

loans.use: to purchase organic fertilizer for his crops, in order to recover from a drought.

loans.name: Mujeres Tayacanes Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por cuatro socias emprendedoras una de ella es Cecilia es una mujer de 48 años de edad, soltera con hijos de 2, 18,y 13 años respectivamente, tiene un año de tener su negocio que es una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio, este negocio lo inicio vendiendo ropa interior y calzados y con las ganancias fue adquiriendo productos de pulperías el credito lo invertira en la compra de granos basicos como arroz, frijoles, azucar, aceite, carne de pollo carne de res, productos lacteos, productos delmor, jabon de baño, jabon de lavar, perecederos tec. Antonia vende tortilla, nacatamales, frijoles cocidos, leñas, helados, hielo, refrescos naturales etc. Azucena vende ropa nueva y variada y Mileydi vende ropa y  tiene una pulpería.
texts.en: This group is made up of four enterprising members. One of them is Cecilia. She is 48 and single with children aged 2, 18, and 13. She has had her business, a small grocery store in her home, for a year. She started this business by selling underwear and footwear, and with the savings she bought grocery products. She will invest the loan in purchasing basics like rice, beans, sugar, oil, chicken, beef, dairy products, Delmor products (packaged meat products), bath soap, washing soap, perishable goods, etc. Antonia sells tortillas, tamales, cooked beans, firewood, ice cream, ice, natural drink, etc. Azucena sells assorted new clothing and Mileydi sells clothing and has a small grocery store.

loans.use: to buy basics like rice, beans, sugar, oil, beef, chicken, perishable goods, washing soap, bath soap, dairy products, Delmor products, etc.

loans.name: Xiomara Elizabeth

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Por Un Nuevo Amanecer se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive la señora Xiomara, tiene 31 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 13 y 6 años, el mayor estudia en colegio y el menor en escuela. Su esposo es chofer.

Doña Xiomara es una muy buena madre y esposa que se dedica al comercio, vende zapatos por catálogos y productos de Avon, Lebel, Yanbal (perfumes, cremas, bisutería entre otras cosas), su forma de venta es puerta a puerta para lo cual sale tres días a la semana a realizar los pedidos los mismos que luego entrega a crédito y cobra cada ocho días, ella lleva 6 años en este negocio y  le va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar cremas, perfumes, bisutería y zapatos. Esta desde el inicio  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos y sin tantos requisitos. 

Su sueño es darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The village bank Por un Nuevo Amanecer meets every 15 days in the canton of Montecristi, known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for nationally and internationally recognized artisan crafts. They are famous for their straw hats.

Xiomara, 31, lives here. She is in a civil union and has two children, ages 13 and 6. Her older child is in high school and the younger in elementary. Her husband is a chauffeur. 

Xiomara is a very good wife and mother, and she works as a merchant. She sells shoes from catalogs, along with products from Avon, Lebel and Yanbal (perfumes, creams, jewelry and other things). She sells door to door three days a week to take orders, which she delivers on credit and collects payment every 8 days. She has been doing this for 6 years and it's going very well.

This loan is to buy creams, perfumes, jewelry and shoes. She has been part of this village bank since the beginning and likes it because the loans are quick and don't have a lot of requirements. 

Her dream is to give her children the best.

loans.use: to buy creams, perfumes, jewelry and shoes.

loans.name: Katia Faviola

texts.es: Katia tiene 38 años de edad y nació  en la ciudad del Cusco, ella tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene  dos hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Naupasunchis” de la ciudad del Cusco. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de bebidas alcohólicas como cerveza y gaseosas. Ella tiene un depósito que esta implementado con los productos necesarios. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más cajas de gaseosas y cervezas. Esta feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Katia, born in Cusco, is 38 years old.  She has a partner, with whom she has two children.  She is a member of the "Naupasunchis" communal bank in the city of Cusco.  Her main income comes from selling alcoholic beverages, such as beer, and sodas.  She has a store stocked with all the necessary products.  On this occasion she needs a loan to buy more crates of sodas and beers.  She is happy with the loan and promise to make the repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy more crates of sodas and beers.

loans.name: Margarita Cecilia

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Por Un Nuevo Amanecer se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive la señora Margarita, tiene 40 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 17, 11 Y 10  años, el mayor estudia en universidad y los  menores  en escuela. Su esposo es cerrajero. 

Doña Margarita hace varios años aprendió corte y confección en un centro artesanal de la ciudad. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora que le gusta valerse por sí misma para  sacar adelante a su familia, es maestra por contrato en una escuela de la ciudad pero además cuando llega a su casa donde tiene un taller de costura se dedica a confeccionar ropa más que todo para niños y damas, tiene muchos clientes que llegan hasta su hogar para que les confeccione sus prendas y en tiempo de entrada a clases el trabajo aumenta mucho, como para  ella lo mas importe es cumplir con los clientes en estos casos contrata operarias para que le ayuden.  Lleva 11 años dedicada a esta labor y le va bastante bien.

Este crédito es para comprar hilos, telas, cierres y otros materiales para la costura que necesita para confeccionar sus prendas. Esta desde el inicio  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos le son de mucha ayuda.
 
Sus sueños son que sus hijos terminen sus estudios y sean profesionales.
texts.en:
The communal bank Por Un Nuevo Amanecer (For a new dawn) meets every fifteen days in the Montecristi Canton, known for its rich pre-colonial culture and its handicrafts which are renowned nationally and internationally. It is the place of the famous straw hats (sombreros). 

Margarita lives in this place. She is 40 years old, married, and has three children who are 17, 11, and 10 years old. The oldest studies in the university and the younger ones are in school. Her husband is a locksmith.

A few years ago, Margarita learned about tailoring in a handicrafts center in the city. She is a very hardworking woman who likes to be useful for moving her family forward. She is a teacher with a contract in a school in the city, but when she arrives home she also works in a sewing shop and sews clothing mostly for children and women. She has many customers who arrive at her house so that she sews them something. At the beginning of the schoolyear, the workload increases by a lot. For her, the most important thing is to attend to her customers, and in these cases she hires workers to help her. She has been dedicated to this work for 11 years and it is going very well for her. 

This loan is to buy thread, fabric, zippers and other materials for sewing that she needs to sew the clothing. She has been with the communal bank since the beginning and she likes it because the loans are very useful for her. 
 
Her dreams are for her children to finish their studies and become professionals.

loans.use: to buy thread, fabric, zippers, and other materials for sewing

loans.name: Las Triunfadoras Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socias emprendedoras  de éxito una de ellas es Rosa que tiene tres años de vender ropa nueva unisex y de todas las edades, es una mujer casada, con cuatro hijos de 3, 16, 14, y 12 años de edad, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de zapatos y ropa nueva variada, Alba Luz vende cosméticos de la Avon y venta de queso, crema chontaleña y Rosa tiene una pulpería en su domicilio.
texts.en: This group is made up of three successful and enterprising partners. One of them is Rosa, who has been selling new clothes to men, women and people of all ages for three years. Rosa is married and she has four children, ages 3, 12, 14 and 16. She will use the loan to buy shoes and a variety of new clothes. Alba Luz, another partner, sells Avon cosmetics as well as locally-made cheese and cream. The other Rosa has a small grocery store in her home.

loans.use: to buy shoes and a variety of new clothes like women's and men's pants, shirts, and underwear.

loans.name: Melba

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Por Un Nuevo Amanecer se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive la señora Melba, tiene 55 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cinco hijos, todos ellos ya mayores de edad, una de ellos aun vive en su casa. Su esposo es albañil.

Doña Melba para poder salir adelante y ayudar a su marido con los gastos del hogar  se dedica al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo según la temporada, en la actualidad está vendiendo ropa interior y trajes de baño para niñas ya que en esta temporada tienen mucha salida, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta aprovechando sus ratos libres y  los fines de semana que tiene más tiempo, ella deja su mercadería a crédito y cobra cada quince días, empezó con este negocio gracias al primer  crédito que recibió del banco y esto es de gran ayuda mucho mas cando su marido se queda sin trabajo como en la actualidad.

Este crédito es para comprar trajes de baño y ropa interior. Lleva 4 ciclos en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque gracias al primer crédito empezó su negocio. 

Su sueño es que nunca les falte nada a su familia.
texts.en: The communal bank, "Por un Nuevo Amanecer" meets every two weeks in the Montecristi canton, which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and its artisanship, which is recognized at a national and international level.  It is also known for its famous straw hats.  Here is where señora Melba lives.  She is 55 and is in a common-law marriage from which she has 5 children.  All of them are adults, and one of them still lives in her home.  Her husband is a bricklayer.  Melba helps her husband with their home's expenses to get ahead.  She sells clothing of all kinds according to the season.  Currently she is selling underwear and bathing suits for girls since they sell a lot in this season.  She sells door-to-door, making the most of her free time and the weekends, when she has more time.  She sells on credit and collects every two weeks.  She started with this business thanks to the first loan she received from her communal bank.  This helps her much more when her husband does not have a job like right now.  She will use this loan to buy bathing suits and underwear.  This is her fourth loan with the communal bank.  She likes it because, thanks to her first loan, she started her business.  Her dream is for her family never to need anything.

loans.use: to buy bathing suits and underwear.

loans.name: Maida

texts.es: Maida tiene 40 años de edad y nació  en la ciudad del Cusco, ella es madre y padre para sus dos hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Naupasunchis” de la ciudad del Cusco. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de libros. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como libros. Esta feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Maida is 40 years old, and she was born in the city of Cusco. She is mother and father to her two children. Maida belongs to the communal bank “Naupasunchis” in Cusco. Her main economic activity is selling books, and at this time she needs a loan to buy merchandise like books. She is happy about the loan, and she promises to make the payments of her quota.

loans.use: buy merchandise like books.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es: La señora Marina tiene 32 años de edad, vive con su esposo, tienen tres hijos que dependen de ellos, dos de ellos se encuentran estudiando en la escuela uno está en tercero básico y el otro está en primero básico, su ultimo hijito es todavía un bebe que necesita mucho cuidado de ella. Actualmente ella se dedica a la siembra de maíz, cría y venta de gallinas criollas y también los días sábado de cada semana va a ganarse en las granjas pelando pollos, el diario vivir de la Señora Marina es muy sacrificado y agotador ya que son varias actividades que tiene que atender.  Los ingresos que obtienen no son suficientes para cubrir los gastos de la alimentación de su familia, por ese motivo ella tomo la decisión de solicitar un crédito para  aumentar la siembra de maíz, aprovechando la disponibilidad de su terreno, Con esta inversión ella quiere mejorar sus ingresos que le permitirá mejorar su condición de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Marina is 32 years old and lives with her husband. They have three children who are dependent on them, two of whom are studying in school, one in first grade, the other in third. Her last son is still a baby who needs a lot of her care. Currently, she is planting corn, raising and selling free-range chickens, and on Saturdays, she earns money on farms plucking chickens. Marina’s daily life is selfless and exhausting because she has several activities she must attend to. The income she earns is not enough to cover the costs of feeding her family. For this reason, she decided to ask for a loan in order to increase her corn harvest and take advantage of available land. With this investment, she wants to improve her income which will allow her to improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: prepare land for growing corn and purchase agrochemicals.

loans.name: Rosa Ramona Asunción

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Por Un Nuevo Amanecer se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive la señora Rosa, tiene 52 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cinco hijos mayores de edad e independientes. Su esposo no trabaja por motivos de enfermedad.

Doña Rosa es una mujer muy luchadora que siempre le gusto valerse por sí misma y obtener sus propios ingresos gracias a su trabajo, tiene un negocio de venta de comida, prepara almuerzos y meriendas en su casa los mismos que luego entrega en una camioneta por toda la ciudad, con ella trabaja una persona que es la encargada de realizar las entregas y a la cual le paga por este servicio, a diario tiene que entregar hasta 70 almuerzos y 30 meriendas,  lleva 25 años dedicada a esta actividad razón por lo cual tiene mucha clientela además por lo delicioso que ella prepara la comida.

Este crédito es para comprar arroz, carne, pescado y otros víveres para preparar los alimentos. Lleva 10 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos siempre son de mucha ayuda. 

Su sueño es seguir adelante en su negocio.
texts.en:
The communal bank Por Un Nuevo Amanecer meets every 15 days in Montecristi, a region known for it's pre-colonial culture and it's crafts, which have been recognized on a national and international level. It's the home of the famous Panama hat. 

This is where 52 year old Rosa lives. She has a domestic partner and 5 grown children. Her spouse can't work due to illness. 

Rosa is a feisty woman who has always like to stand on her own and earn her own money. She has a business selling lunches and snacks from her home. The same food is also delivered all over the city by van. Rosa has one person working with her who is responsible for making deliveries and who gets paid for this. Every day they deliver 70 lunches and 30 snacks. She has been running her business for 25 years and has a lot of customers because she makes delicious food. 

This loan is to buy rice, meat, fish and other provisions for preparing the food. Rosa has been a member of this community bank for 10 years and she likes the loans because they always help her very much. Her dream is to continue running her business.

loans.use: to buy rice, meat, fish and other supplies.

loans.name: Tropigas Group

texts.es: Este es un grupo formado por cinco socias de éxito una de ella es Teresita que tiene una agencia de gas butano en su domicilio, tiene 3 años de tener su negocio, es soltera tiene 6 hijos todos mayores, es enfermera profesional como actividad  colateral el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de productos de tanques y liquido de gas butano, Celsa tiene una pulpería en su domicilio, Katherin brinda servicios de recorridos estudiantil en  colegio y empresa privada, Yadira tiene también una pulpería en su domicilio y Ana María tiene pulpería en su casa.
texts.en:
This group is made up of five successful women. One of them is Teresita who runs a butane gas agency out of her home, a business she’s had for three years. She has six adult children. As well as running the butane business, Teresita is a professional nurse. She plans to use the loan money to buy gas tanks and liquid butane.

Celsa runs a corner store out of her home, Katherin has a private business taking students to school, and Yadira and Ana María also run corner stores from their homes.

loans.use: buy gas tanks and liquid butane

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Juan Carlos tiene 23 años de edad y nació  en la ciudad del Cusco, él tiene una ferretería donde vende diferentes artículos, él pertenece al banco comunal “Naupasunchis” de la ciudad del Cusco. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar pinturas, clavos y otras cosas más. Esta feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is 23 years old and was born in the city of Cusco, where he has a hardware store selling various items. He belongs to the communal bank "Naupasunchis" in the city of Cusco. 

This time, he requires a loan to buy paint, nails, and other things. He is happy for the loan and promises to meet his quota payments.

loans.use: to buy paint, nails and other things.

loans.name: Jessica Maribel

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Por Un Nuevo Amanecer se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive la señora Jessica, tiene 28 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 7 y 4  años, el mayor estudia en escuela. Su esposo es obrero. 

Doña Jessica es una muy buena madre y esposa que para ayudar a solventar los gastos del hogar se dedica al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo y su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, ella sale a vender  su mercadería en las mañanas ya que a esa hora su hijo está en la escuela y puede salir sin ningún problema, deja a crédito y cobra cada quince días,  para comprar su mercadería  ella viaja a Guayaquil ya que allá consigue más barato y variedad lo cual le gusta a sus clientes, lleva más de 6 años en este negocio y le ha ido muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Lleva 2 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos. 

Su sueño es tener un local para vender su mercadería.
texts.en:
The village bank Por Un Nuevo Amanecer meets every 15 days in the canton of Montecristi, known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for nationally and internationally-recognized crafts. They are famous for the straw hats made here.

Jessica, 28, is married and has two children, 7 and 4. Her older child is in school. Her husband is a laborer.

Jessica is a very good wife and mother who, in order to help with the household costs, is a merchant. She sells all types of clothing from door to door. She goes out in the mornings to work while her son is in school and she can leave without a problem. She sells on credit and collects payment every 15 days. She goes to Guayaquil to buy her merchandise because she gets it cheaper and with greater variety, which makes her customers happy. She has been doing this for more than 6 years and it's going well.

This loan is to buy pants, blouses, shirts and children's clothing. She has been in the village bank for 2 years and likes it because the loans have helped her. Her dream is to have a store to sell her merchandise.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, shorts and children's clothing.

loans.name: Las Frescas Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Dominga desde hace 15 años vende nacatamales en su casa, es viuda con tres hijos de 2, 14 y 18 años de edad, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima para hacer los nacatamales como carne de cerdo, hojas de chagüites, legumbre, papas, arroz, vegetales, perecederos etc. Esmeralda vende comida y Ileana vende ropa y cosméticos.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three business women. One of them, Dominga, has been selling nacatamales out of her home for 15 years. She is a widow with three children, ages 2, 14 and 18. The loan will be used to buy ingredients to make nacatamles like pork, banana leaves, beans, potatoes, rice, vegetables, perishables, etc. 

Esmeralda sells food and Ileana sells clothing and cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy meat, chicken, corn, pork, perishables, etc.

loans.name: Maria Milagros

texts.es: Milagros tiene 25 años de edad y nació  en la ciudad del Cusco, ella es diseñadora grafica trabaja de forma independiente, ella tiene varios clientes que le piden trabajos porque sus trabajos son de buena calidad, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Naupasunchis” de la ciudad del Cusco. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como papel, tintas, papeles especiales y otras cosas más. Esta feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Milagros is 25 years old, and she was born in the city of Cusco.  She is a graphic designer who has her own business.  She has a number of customers who ask for her because of her good quality work.  Milagros is a member of the communal bank “Naupasunchis," which meets in the city of Cusco.  At this time, she needs a loan to buy supplies for her work, such as paper, ink, specialty papers, and other supplies.  She is happy to be getting this loan, and she promises to comply with the payment terms.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her business such as paper, ink, specialty papers, and other supplies

loans.name: Guadalupe Idalinda

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Por Un Nuevo Amanecer se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive la señora Guadalupe, tiene 54 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad, pero  aún viven en su casa. Su esposo es maestro.

Doña Guadalupe tiene un local en un museo de la ciudad por el cual paga un arriendo, allí  vende todo tipo de artesanía elaboradas en paja toquilla, cerámica, madera y otros materiales, ella al igual que varias compañeras del lugar muchas veces realizan ferias ya sea en la misma ciudad o en otros cantones exponiendo sus productos y es así cuando mas venden, lo que más vende son los sombreros de paja toquilla ya que estos son muy apreciados por los extranjeros que llegan hasta el lugar. Compra las artesanías en la zona y también le traen de la sierra, lleva dos años con su local.

Este crédito es para surtir aún más su negocio, va a comprar toda clase de artesanías. Este es el tercer ciclo en el  Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos son a muy bajos intereses. 

Su sueño es tener su local propio.
texts.en:
The communal bank Por Un Nuevo Amanecer (For a new dawn) meets every 15 days en the Montecristi Canton, known for its rich pre-colonial culture and its handicrafts, which are renowned nationally and internationally. It is the place of the famous straw hats (sombreros). 

In this place lives Guadalupe, who is 54 years old, married, and has 3 children who are no longer minors, but they still live in her house. Her husband is a teacher. 

Guadalupe rents out a spot in a museum in the city, where she sells all types of handicrafts made of straw, ceramic, wood, and other material. Just like other vendors from the city, she sells her wares in fairs in the city or in other places, presenting her products. It is in those times that they are sold the most. What she sells most are straw hats, since those are very appreciated by foreigners who arrive to this place. She buys the hats in the city and is also brought hats from the mountains. She has had her shop for two years. 

This loan is to further stock her business. She is going to buy all types of handicrafts. This is her third cycle in the communal bank, and she likes it because the loans have low interest. Her dream is to have her own shop.

loans.use: to buy handicrafts.

loans.name: Laura Aida

texts.es: Luara tiene 64 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene tres hijos, ella nació en la ciudad de Abancay pero vive en la hermosa relación del Cusco, ella es profesora en un colegio de la ciudad del Cusco, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Naupasunchis” de la ciudad del Cusco. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento de la casa. Esta feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Laura is 63 years old, married, and the fruit of her beautiful relationship are her three children. She was born in the city of Abancay, but she lives in gorgeous Cusco where she is a high school teacher. Laura belongs to a communal bank “Naupasunchis” in Cusco. At this time, she needs the loan for home maintenance. She is happy about the loan, and promises to complete the payments of her quota.

loans.use: pay to do maintenance on her home.

loans.name: Debora Herminia

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Por Un Nuevo Amanece se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive la señora Debora, tiene 45 años de edad, hace varios años su esposo falleció y quedo viuda pero de esa relación tiene 4  hijos, tres ya mayores y uno de 12 años de edad el mismo que estudia en colegio, todos sus hijos aun viven en su casa.

Doña Debora es una muy buena madre que para que a sus hijos no les falte nada se dedica al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo y su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, ella se va hasta los campos lugares donde tiene muchos clientes a los cuales les deja su mercadería a crédito y les cobra cada ocho días, ella compra su mercadería en Guayaquil ciudad a la que viaja cada vez que necesita más mercadería, lleva más de 5 años en este negocio y es gracias a este que puede salir adelante.

Este crédito es para comprar pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Lleva 8 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque con uno de los créditos empezó su negocio.
 
Su sueño es tener un local para vender su mercadería.
texts.en:
The members of the New Dawn Community Bank meet twice a month in the canton of Montecristi which is known for its rich pre-colonial history and its crafts which are recognized both nationally and internationally. It’s the place where the famous straw hats are made.

45-year old Sra. Debora makes her home here. Her husband died several years ago and she became a widow. She has four children, three of whom are adults and the fourth is 12 years old. He attends high school. All of her children still live at home.

Debora is a very good mother and her children lack for nothing.  She runs a business selling all types of clothing door to door. She even travels into the countryside where she has many customers. She lets them have the items on credit and then collects money every week.

Debora buys the clothing in Guayaquil and travels there when she needs more merchandise. She’s had the business for more than five years, and it has provided her with the income to get ahead. 

She plans to use the loan to buy pants, blouses, shirts and children’s clothing. Debora has been a member of the community bank for eight years. She likes it because she used one of the loans to start her business. Her dream is to own premises from which she can sell the clothing.

loans.use: buy pants, blouses, shirts and children’s clothing

loans.name: Alfarero Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por cuatro socias emprendedora una de  ellas es  Irene desde hace 7 años vende prendas de platas, ropa unisex de adultos y niños, tiene 40 años cuenta con dos hijos una de 1 año y el otro de 23 años respectivamente, es casada y solicita el crédito para invertir en la compra de productos de prendas como aretes de plata, pulseras de platas, anillos de platas, cadenas de platas, ropa variada de adulto como pantalón de varón, pantalón de mujer, camisas de dama, camisa de varón, ropa interior de caballeros, ropa interior de damas etc. Fabiola vende helados de eskimo, cervezas y sandalias, Heydi vende ropa ambulante y Emma vende comida y refrescos naturales en su domicilio.
texts.en: This group is made up of four members. Among them is Irene. For the last seven years she has sold silver jewelry and unisex clothes for adults and children. She is 40 years old, married and has two children, ages 1 and 23. She is asking for this loan to buy items such as silver earrings, watches, silver rings, silver chains, and various clothes for adults such as pants, shirts, underwear, etc. Fabiola sells ice cream, beer and sandals. Heydi sells clothing door-to-door. Emma sells food and drinks from her home.

loans.use: to buy items such as silver earrings, watches, silver rings, silver chains, and various clothes for adults such as pants, shirts, underwear, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Elvia

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal 30 de Agosto se reúne en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la alegría de su gente.

En este lugar vive la señora Rosa, tiene 51 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos todos mayores de edad, una de ellos aun vive en su casa. Su esposo trabaja para el Estado.
