Cleofe is grateful for the loan that has been granted her, and she pledges to comply with the repayment plan.

loans.use: to buy apples, plantains, oranges, and grapes at wholesale price.

loans.name: Say

texts.en:
Living in a thatched-roof house in Dambae district of Kampong Cham province, Say is a young mother of one son who still depends on her. To feed the family,  she grows cassava and paddy rice on one hectare area each. She has been involved in this business for three years.

 Say is a first-time borrower with VisionFund, Kiva’s partner. She is applying for 2,000,000 KHR in order to buy fertilizer, insecticide, and to pay labor fees for her cassava farm. She hopes this purchase will boost her crop productivity and return her a good yield so that she can make more income for her family, especially for her son.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, insecticide, and to pay labor fees

loans.name: Seat's Group

texts.en:
Seat is 47 years old and single. She resides in Ek Phnom district of Battambang province where she makes a living through agriculture business, rice growing and vegetable growing (corn, cucumbers, and wax gourds). It is the business that she has been engaged in for 33 years and she is able to earn up to 20,800 KHR per day and save up 8,600 KHR after deducting all expenses. 

This is the sixth loan for Seat with VisionFund, Kiva’s partner. She managed to pay back her past loans completely and with success and it has helped to better support her business and return her a decent income for daily food consumption. Now, she is in a group of two female members and she is the group leader. She is going to spend her portion to pay for harvesting fees for her crops. Furthermore, she is going to use some portion of her loan in order to pay for plowing, potash and rice seed purchasing for the upcoming planting season. She hopes to make more income from her business so that she can  support herself adequately.

loans.use: To pay for plowing and to buy potash and rice seed

loans.name: Savaen

texts.en: Savaen, a local farmer originally from the Dambae district of Kampong Cham Province, is 26 years old and the mother of two schoolchildren. The primary income-generating business is growing cassava, which she plants on two hectares of farmland. She has been in this business for 10 years. Including this cycle, she is a third-time borrower with VisionFund, Kiva’s partner. The past loans, which she paid back completely, have supported her business gradually and given her back a decent income with proper daily food for her children, better than before. With the new requested loan, she is going to buy a mini-tractor to support her business, especially for shipping cassava. Moreover, she is going to spend a portion of it to buy fertilizer and insecticide, and to pay labor fees. She hopes to earn more income from her current business so that she can keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and insecticide, and to pay labor fees

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: La Sra. Elizabeth y su familia se dedicaron a esta actividad  teniendo que pasar por muchas circunstancias y trabas que le puso la vida. La familia de la Sra. Elizabeth fue siempre muy humilde, por lo que desde niña trabajo vendiendo refrescos para poder ayudar a sustentar a su familia económicamente  pero  con el pensamiento de seguir adelante y superarse cada día mas , es que en ese sentido  curso el colegio desde la primaria hasta culminar la secundaria saliendo bachiller y se dedico al comercio, querer superarse  en la vida y tener un terrenito propio donde  pueda realizar su actividad de manera independiente y tener una vida mucho mejor sin tener que pasar necesidades es que en ese sentido que necesita el préstamo para poder ampliar mas su actividad económica que es la venta de bebidas multivitamínicos.
texts.en:
Mrs Elizabeth and her family started this business facing a lot of difficult situations. Her family did not have enough economic resources when she was a kid, so she had to work selling beverages in order to contribute to her families’ support. However, they were always thinking of ways to get ahead in life with their families and improve their situation every day more.

She finished high school and after graduating she became a salesperson. She wanted to succeed and be able to buy her own land in order to develop independently and have a better life, without difficulties.

She is now requesting a loan from the institution in order to expand her business of multi-vitamin drinks.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Keo's Group

texts.en: Originally from the Sangke district of Battambang Province, Keo is married and has five children. Currently, she needs to provide for only one child as he is still in school. Her sources of income are mainly from rice cropping and orange planting. This is the business that she has engaged in for 25 years. Keo is not a new borrower with VisionFund, Kiva’s partner. She has taken loans with VisionFund for the past two cycles already and successfully repaid back the loans, which better supported her business and her living condition. Now, she formed a group of two to apply for a new cycle. Both of them are seeking 1,400,000 KHR each. For Keo as a group leader, she is going to spend her portion to buy fertilizer, to pump water, and to pay for labor fees for her farmland. She hopes to grow her orange fruitfully and return her a good yield with high income so as she can sustain her living standards.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, to pump water, and to pay for labor fees

loans.name: Chek's Group

texts.en:
Chek is a breadwinner in a family consisting of five children, residing in Sangke district of Battambang province. Currently, he and his wife need to support only three children as they are still in school. To provide decent daily food for their children, this couple grows corn and cabbage. Chek has been involved in this business for 25 years and is able to earn up to 20,300 KHR per day to support himself and his family.

This is a first loan group consisting of three members. The total amount for this group loan is 2,400,000 KHR. Chek, the leader,  is going to spend his loan portion in amount of 400,000 KHR to pay plowing fees and to buy potash plus insecticide for his corn field. He hopes to gain more yield and earn triple the income so that he can set aside some money in order to buy a water pump for his cash-crop.

loans.use: To buy potash plus insecticide for her corn field

loans.name: Panha

texts.en:
Panha, a divorced mother of one daughter, is 32 years old and a local farmer who supports her daughter through growing cassava on one hectare. With 10 years’ experience in this business, she is able to earn up to 20,000 KHR per day. 

Panha has never been with VisionFund before. Now, she is applying for her first loan in the amount of 2,000,000 KHR in order to lease an additional plot of farmland to grow cassava and to buy potash plus insecticide. She hopes to earn triple the income from her current business so as to keep her child in school until tertiary level.

loans.use: To lease an additional plot of farmland to grow cassava

loans.name: Asunta

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de picanteria,la socia preparar platos como cuy al horno,pollo al horno y caldo de pollo,la socia se dedica al negocio 7 años y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener una picanteria mas amplio.La socia solicita el credito para comprar productos de cocinar como pollo,carne y verduras.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Asunta continues running her small restaurant, where she prepares delicious dishes, including roasted guinea pig, chicken soup and many others. She now has seven years of experience at her restaurant, and business is going well. Her dream is to grow and expand her restaurant, and she plans to use the support from this loan to purchase food items for preparing her dishes, including chicken, red meat and vegetables.

Asunta is grateful for this opportunity, and promises to complete all scheduled loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to purchase food items for her restaurant, such as chicken, red meat and vegetables.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de platanos y ocas al horno que es un producto parecido a la papa,la socia vende en forma ambulatoria desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los platanos y ocas.La socia solicita le credito para comprar platanos y ocas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sofia is continuing with her business selling baked bananas and baked ocas, which is a product that is very similar to a potato.  She works as a street vendor from 9am until 4pm.  She has already had this business for 5 years, and it is doing very well.  Sofia's dream is to have her own shop where she could sell her bananas and ocas.  She is requesting a loan to buy bananas and ocas.

Sofia is happy to be receiving this loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy bananas and ocas (Andean tubers)

loans.name: Nicasia

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de golosinas,la socia vende galletas,dulces y chocolates,la socia vende en forma ambulatoria,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener una tienda de abarrotes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar galletas,dulces y chocolates.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Nicasia continues working in her business selling sweets. She sells cookies, sweets, and chocolates. She is a street vendor. She works from 8:00am until 6:00pm. She has been in this business for 7 years and it is going well for her. Her dream is to have a small grocery store. She is requesting the loan to buy cookies, sweets, and chocolates. 

Nicasia is grateful to those who are a part of her dream through this loan and she pledges to comply with the established repayment plan.

loans.use: to buy cookies, sweets, and chocolates

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio transporte,el socio hace servicio de taxi,el socio trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hastas las 10:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño del socio es tener un carro nuevo.El socio solicita el credito para comprar llantas para su carro.


El socio está contento con el crédito otorgado y agradece a los inversionistas de kiva.
texts.en: This member still works in the transport business. He works in taxi service. He works from 6 am until 10 pm. He has been in this business for eight years and it is going very well for him. His dream is to have a new car. He is applying for the loan to buy tires for his car. This member is happy for the loan and is grateful to the Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy tires for his car.

loans.name: Saturnina

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de costura,la socia tiene un taller donde confecciona pantalones,vestidos de fiesta y faldas,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar su taller de costura.La socia solicita el credito para comprar telas e hilos.

La socia se muestra muy satisfecha y agradecida por el apoyo que se le brindara mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus deudas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Saturina continues working in her sewing business. She has a workshop where she makes pants, party dresses, and skirts. She has been in this business for 7 years and things are going very well for her. Her dream is to expand her sewing shop. She is requesting the loan to buy fabrics and threads.

Saturina is very satisfied with and grateful for the support that she will be given through this loan and she pledges to comply with the established repayment plan.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and threads.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de docencia,la socia es docente de un jardin de niños,al socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasa las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 6 años en este trabajo y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un colegio.La socia solicita el credito para comprar materiales como papeles,cartulinas y pinturas.

La socia se encuentra satisfecha con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member of this communal bank works as a teacher.  She teaches in a kindergarten, working from 8am until 6pm.  She has been doing this work for 6 years, and it's going very well for her.  Her dream is to have her own school.  She is requesting a loan to buy supplies such as: paper, poster boards, and paint.  

She is pleased with the loan that is being granted to her, and she promises to make the payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as paper, posterboard and paint

loans.name: Máxima

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de quesos,manjares y yogures,la socia elabora estos productos y lo vende en forma ambulatoria,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los quesos,manjares y yogures.La socia solicita el credito para comprar leche de vaca.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Máxima continues her business making and selling cheeses, sweets and yogurts. She travels around selling her products, and now has eight years of experience in this trade. Business is going well, and her dream is to one day have her own store for selling her cheeses, sweets and yogurts. 

Máxima plans to use the support from this loan to purchase cow’s milks for making her products. She is grateful for this opportunity, and promises to complete all scheduled loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to purchase milk for making her cheeses, yogurts and sweets.

loans.name: Matilde

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de ganaderia,la socia vende leche llevando a diferentes lugares como anta,la socia trabaaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de ganaderia.La socia solicita el credito para comprar un ganado y alimentos para los ganados.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower is continuing with her livestock business.  She sells her milk in different places, such as Anta.  She works from 8am until 6pm.  Her dream is to expand her livestock business.  She is requesting a loan to buy a cow and cattle feed.

She is pleased to be getting this loan, and promises to comply with the payment terms.

loans.use: to buy a cow and cattle feed

loans.name: Leocadia

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de leche,la socia vende en forma ambulatoria llevando a diferentes lugares,la socia tambien se dedica al negocio de venta de ganados,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender la leche.La socia solicita el credito para comprar leche.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Leocadia continues her work traveling around selling milk, and also makes a living selling cattle. She now has eight years of experience in this trade, and business is going well. Her dream is to one day have her own store where she can sell milk.

Leocadia plans to use the support from this loan to purchase milk for resale, and promises to make all scheduled loan repayments on time. She is very grateful for this opportunity.

loans.use: to purchase milk for resale at her business.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de ganaderia,la socia cria los ganados los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias,el socio ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de ganaderia.El socio solicita el credito para comprar ganados y alimentos para los ganados.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Mario makes a living raising cattle for resale in various markets. He has been working in this arena for eight years, and business is going very well. His dream is to grow and expand his cattle operation, and he plans to use the support from this loan to purchase cattle as well as feed for his herd.

Mario is grateful for this opportunity, and promises to make all scheduled loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to purchase cattle and feed for his herd.

loans.name: Cirila

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de ganaderia y agricultura,la socia tiene un terreno donde cultiva maiz y papa,la socia tambien los ganados los hace crecer y engordar y luego los vende en las ferias,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de agricultura y ganaderia.La socia solicita el credito para comprar fertilizantes y semillas.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Cirila continues working in farming and animal husbandry. She has land where she grows corn and potatoes.  She also has livestock that she raises and fattens.  She then sells the livestock at the fairs.  She works from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m.  Her dream is to expand her farming and animal husbandry business.

She requests the loan to buy seeds and fertilizer.

She is happy about the loan and commits to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.
